name: Poker Squadrons: Battle of Britain
description:
Fight the Battle of Britain, four Poker hands at a time!

Poker Squadrons is a single-player card game where you play out the events of the Battle of Britain.

You take control of a British Royal Air Force Fighter Squadron and are pitted against a computer opponent controlling the German Luftwaffe.

Both sides draw cards from a shared 52-card deck to simultaneously assemble 4 poker hands to send into combat.

The shuffled deck and opponent's AI ensure a unique challenge each time you play.

Poker Squadrons brings you back to 1940, when Germany launched Operation Sea Lion, their plan to invade Great Britain. Events from the historic aerial battle are presented in the game's 18 stages, which are played in 4 phases:

1. Scramble: Draw cards to assemble the best 4 poker hands possible.

2. Secret Cards: Play a secret card increase your chance of victory in combat. NOTE: This phase is not available until stage 3.

3. Form Up: Drag to reorder your assembled poker hands to match up against the incoming poker hands, some of which may contain hidden cards that remain face-down until the combat phase begins.

4. Combat: You must win at least 3 out of the 4 poker hand matchups to clear each stage.

System Upgrade:

name: PC F√∫tbol 3.0
description:
Iteration of the PC F√∫tbol series. It includes an updating of each of the aspects of the game according to the 1994/95 season of the Spanish Primera Divisi√≥n, including database, line-ups, team information and such.

But not just that. This edition was specially "revolutionary" as it was the first of the series to allow you to buy players from other teams, and also to let you continue playing one season after another, to test if you can get a better position having different players from the start.

name: Golden Tee Mobile
description:
Golden Tee Golf, the golfing game phenomenon enjoyed by more than 20 million players over the past three decades, can now be played in the palm of your hand. Tee up and see if you can golf past the snowy tundra peaks in our wintery update!

Tee it up any time, whether you crave a relaxing trip through the front 9 or a teeth-grinding challenge on windy bluffs. Play a free golf game with multiple, unique game modes, including daily challenges and multiplayer golf battles.

Golden Tee Golf has it all: contests for big prizes. Diverse golfing equipment customization options. Golfer clothing choices with varied, detailed styles. Golf courses with intricate, white-knuckled designs. The trademark arcade gameplay that allows you TOTAL CONTROL. Tee off and make shots as quick and smooth as buttered lightning.

Golden Tee Golf gives you the most detailed golfing game experience. Choose your golf club, get specialized golf balls, select your tees and customize your golfer. Control your golf swing with a swipe, select the best club for the job and monitor wind conditions and the terrain as you aim for a hole in one.

The classic arcade game gets new life on your phone, creating the most authentic golf experience wherever you are.

name: Final Fantasy VII: Ever Crisis

Final Fantasy VII: Ever Crisis is a mobile game covering the whole FFVII timeline by splitting each story into short chapters focused on important moments using animated cutscenes, some with conversation options, followed by a battle.

Relive the most memorable moments from FFVII and experience the journey of a young hero Sephiroth.

Experience both classic and new stories within the FFVII universe presented in a retro-style look combined with modern, beautifully rendered graphics, that‚Äôs easily accessible on the go. Team up your favorite characters and customize each one with iconic gear and weapons to defeat powerful opponents in Solo or Co-op battle mode.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: A Sleeper's Quest: A Labyrinth to Thee
description: A Sleeper's Quest: A Labyrinth to Thee is a simple, unique and difficult 3D Maze Platformer that requires platforming precision, patience and memorization.

name: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds: Season 10
description: Hide, Seek, Survive

name: Rocket Arena: Season 2
description: Blast your way to victory! Rocket Arena: Season 2 will see the introduction of a new hero (Leef), new maps, events, and exciting outfits to collect, plus tons of incredible unlockables waiting in the Blast Pass!

name: Rocket Arena: Season 3
description: New Hero, Emotes, Totem Companions, New Blast Pass, and More!

name: Paris Chase
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Destiny 2: Beyond Light - Season of the Chosen
description: Season of the Chosen includes: New PVE Activity, new strikes, new weapons and armor, new exotics, new story content, new artifact, new triumphs and seals, the H.E.L.M., infamy and valor boosts, trials of osiris and more.

name: Fall Guys: Ultimate Knockout - Season 4
description:
We're traveling to the future...

Astronauts, aliens and the funkiest looking Fall Guys this side of synthwave will bumble their way through a sci-fi inspired Season packed with seven new Rounds, oodles of challenges, costumes and delicious features!

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Crimson Heist
description: In life, you have to commit to the things that make you happy. For Operator Flores and his RCE-Ratero, it's stealing the corrupt to help his fellow citizens. Additionally, you will be able to roam the newly reworked Border.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War - Season Two
description: The end begins. It‚Äôs a jungle out there. Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War - Season 2 takes players to the rainforests of Laos, where Woods and his strike team have tracked down Perseus through a vast cartel network. Drop in with the newest in Cold War guerrilla gear, including new weapons, Operator Skins, Legendary Blueprints, and more.

name: Pok√©mon Brilliant Diamond
description:
Revisit the Sinnoh region and the story of the Pok√©mon Diamond Version game
Experience the nostalgic story from the Pok√©mon Diamond Version game in a reimagined adventure, Pok√©mon Brilliant Diamond, now on the Nintendo Switch system! Adventures in the Pok√©mon Brilliant Diamond game will take place in the familiar Sinnoh region. Rich in nature and with mighty Mount Coronet at its heart, Sinnoh is a land of many myths passed down through the ages. You‚Äôll choose either Turtwig, Chimchar, or Piplup to be your first partner Pok√©mon and then set off on your journey to become the Champion of the Pok√©mon League. Along the way, you‚Äôll be able to encounter the Legendary Pok√©mon Dialga.

Adventure together with the Pok√©mon that appeared in the Pok√©mon Diamond Version game. Players of the original games can revisit familiar places and relive familiar scenes, while first time players can enjoy plenty of fun encounters and surprises that the Sinnoh region has to offer. The original story and the scale of the Sinnoh region‚Äôs towns and routes have been faithfully reproduced. This remake has also been revitalized with some of the player-friendly features of modern Pok√©mon games and up-close-and-personal Pok√©mon battle scenes.

Whether you played Pok√©mon Diamond Version or Pok√©mon Pearl Version back in the day or you‚Äôre encountering these games for the first time, there‚Äôs something for everyone to enjoy.

name: Pok√©mon Shining Pearl

Revisit the Sinnoh region and the story of the Pok√©mon Pearl Version game
Experience the nostalgic story from the Pok√©mon Pearl Version game in a reimagined adventure, Pok√©mon Shining Pearl, now on the Nintendo Switch system! Adventures in the Pok√©mon Shining Pearl game will take place in the familiar Sinnoh region. Rich in nature and with mighty Mount Coronet at its heart, Sinnoh is a land of many myths passed down through the ages. You‚Äôll choose either Turtwig, Chimchar, or Piplup to be your first partner Pok√©mon and then set off on your journey to become the Champion of the Pok√©mon League. Along the way, you‚Äôll be able to encounter the Legendary Pok√©mon Palkia.

Adventure together with the Pok√©mon that appeared in the Pok√©mon Pearl Version game. Players of the original games can revisit familiar places and relive familiar scenes, while first time players can enjoy plenty of fun encounters and surprises that the Sinnoh region has to offer. The original story and the scale of the Sinnoh region‚Äôs towns and routes have been faithfully reproduced. This remake has also been revitalized with some of the player-friendly features of modern Pok√©mon games and up-close-and-personal Pok√©mon battle scenes.

Whether you played Pok√©mon Diamond Version or Pok√©mon Pearl Version back in the day or you‚Äôre encountering these games for the first time, there‚Äôs something for everyone to enjoy.

name: Hani
description: Hani is a Roguelike game that explores dungeons by combining various skills and artifacts.

name: Pok√©mon Legends: Arceus
description:
The Pok√©mon Legends: Arceus game honors past Pok√©mon games‚Äô core gameplay while infusing new action and RPG elements.

You‚Äôll need to catch, survey, and research wild Pok√©mon in a long-gone era of the Sinnoh region to create and complete the region‚Äôs first Pok√©dex.

name: GunSoul Girl
description: This is a first-person shooter game, you will accompany the young girl, challenge all kinds of secrets, get weapons, destroy the polluted enemies in the secret. Unlock memories.

name: Queen Rules
description:
This unique puzzle game invites you to explore enchanted kingdoms as you overcome fun, increasingly difficult levels. Beautiful clay art creates a magical experience.
Explore this hypnotic world built of handmade modeling FIMO clay characters. What's your vehicle? Logic and planning. It's a puzzle experience that's challenging but fun.

name: PUBG Mobile: Season 17
description: Runic Power.

name: Fantasy Maiden Wars: Mystic
description: The second game in the Gensou Shoujo Taisen series after Kou, the overarching story is based on the plots of Mountain of Faith (A.K.A Touhou 10), Immaterial and Missing Power ( Touhou 7.5) and Perfect Cherry Blossom (Touhou 7) in that order. Player can transfer save data from the previous game allowing player to retain items, upgrades, and database information as well as gain some bonuses.

name: Fantasy Maiden Wars: Eternity
description: The third part of Fantasy Maiden Wars, it is based on Imperishable Night (Touhou 8), Silent Sinner in Blue (a manga spinoff) and Subterranean Animism (Touhou 11)

name: Fubar
description: Everybody grab a paint roller and head for the canvas! It's up to you to out-paint your opponents before the time runs out! Play against your friends or the computer in your customized game. Choose different modes such as teams, elimination modes, top score, and more. With nonstop frenzied gameplay, you'll see why it's Fubar!

name: Fantasy Maiden Wars: Dream
description: This is the fourth as well as the final game of the Gensou Shoujou Taisen series. The fourth part retells the story of Undefined Fantastic Object (Touhou 12), Mystic Square (Touhou 5), and an original arc loosely based on Yumetagae Kagaku Seiki - Changeability of Strange Dream, a doujin album by Team Shanghai Alice which was released on 2004.

name: Vaporwave Vision Quest: Kmart Sepulcher
description: 90's nostalgia and inner demons.

name: Ampersat
description: A shooty, slashy, RPG-y game mixing retro and modern sensibilities. A blend of influences from Gauntlet & Smash TV to Zelda & Angband, battle ASCII creatures in colorful areas & free letters to return language to the village.

name: Lore: The Hunt
description: Lore: The Hunt is an online asymmetric (4vs1) horror game where you play as a relentless hunter protecting your property while hunting and capturing, or cunning intruders as they try to break into the mysterious catacombs.

name: Wild-9
description: Wild-9 is a short robot cowboy adventure. You crash on a donut shaped asteroid and when you wake up, you notice some of your ship parts are stolen. On top of that, severe heat is damaging your systems. How will you ever be able to survive this mess?

name: Wife Quest
description: Help Mia to Rescue Fernando, your husband kidnapped by a dark elf witch called Morganna and her fellow monster girls.

name: Morshu RTX
description: Play as the infamous Morshu in this all-new action-packed adventure. Fight crime, or be the crime, the world is yours, my friend.

name: A Hat on Time
description: Grab all 30 time pieces in this short platformer, based on the game A Hat in Time!

name: Fantasy Tavern Sextet Vol. 2: Adventurer's Days
description:
The 2nd part of a 3 part series!
It is an adventure game where you can enjoy a slapstick love harem play with laughter, tears, and a little H in a bar in a different world.

The "E-mote" engine that can move illustrations smoothly and three-dimensionally is used for standing pictures in the game.
The characters displayed on the screen move as if they were alive.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed
description: Collect the best vehicles in the Hot Wheels universe, build spectacular tracks and dive into breathtaking races. The most iconic and sought after Hot Wheels vehicles are waiting for you. Get ready to make them race at full speed!

name: My Baby: First Steps
description:
The DS version of "My Baby: First Steps".

Your baby has grown so fast! Can you believe that a year has already gone by? Take care of your baby from their 1st birthday until they're 3 years old. Your baby will discover its entire environment and learn from it, they'll walk, babble and speak, try to catch every object they can, and put everything in their mouth...Your baby will be the apple of your eye!

name: L'esprit du loup
description: In L'esprit du Loup (aka Spirit of the Wolf) expand your knowledge about ecology with Nicolas Vanier, veteran explorer of the North Pole, who will guide you through an incredible journey of initiation in the understanding and protection of the environment.

name: Mots Croises, La Selection Des Meilleurs Mots Croises, Tele 7 Jeux
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Chaos A La Maison
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Warheads
description: WarHeads is a game set in an unexplored quadrant of space, in which competing players take turns to annihilate opposing players positioned near randomly placed planets. Every level takes place in a new solar system. The gameplay is largely similar to Scorched Earth and Worms with destructible environments, but with different mass and gravity for each planet that affects every missile. By surviving as long as possible the player earns points and money. There are about 50 different weapons for the space ship and there is an editor to customize all weapons as well. Afterwards these weapons can be shared through e-mail. The game can be played in single-player, head-to-head, over a local network or over the internet. Up to ten players simultaneously are supported.

name: Problem Here
description: It‚Äôs little time left to enter the atmosphere, but there are some problems. As a crew, you must manage to get into the atmosphere!

name: The Sisters: Party of the Year
description: Let's get into mischief! Join Maureen, Wendy and all their friends in this new video game adventure! Challenge your friends in crazy mini-games and explore the Sisters' city.

name: QuickSpot: Master of the Right Brain
description: Train your right bright with spot the difference puzzles in QuickSpot: Master of the Right Brain, a "spot the difference action" game playable solo or with friends.

name: Daedalus Demise
description:
In Daedalus Demise you're trapped in an endless maze. Going deeper into this dungeon is your only hope. Be fast to exit each floor and try to go as deep as possible!

Your goal in this action-adventure game is to reach the deepest floor! At each floor you have to find a key and the exit. You can also get some pickaxes, maps, and even a compass along the way to help you, but be quick, since on each floor, you are on a timer!

name: Deltazone
description: Deltazone is a tactical shooter set in a war-torn world where mysterious purple crystals called Veilstone have sparked a global conflict. Players lead a military squad through corrupted landscapes and abandoned cities, fighting against rival factions while dealing with the crystal's radiation effects that have mutated local wildlife and transformed the environment. The game combines strategic resource management of Veilstone crystals with squad-based combat, as players attempt to reclaim their homeland while navigating between hostile human forces and mutated creatures. The narrative unfolds across a campaign where control of these energy-rich crystals determines the balance of power in a world where alliances shift and survival depends on tactical decisions.

name: Chair Is Videogame
description: Chair is videogame. Chair is art. Chair is chair. Videogame is chair. Videogame is art. Videogame is videogame. Art is chair. Art is videogame. Art is art. Chair is videogame. Chair is art. Chair is chair. Videogame is chair. Videogame is art. Videogame is videogame. Art is chair. Art is videogame. Art is art.

name: Disney's Treasure Planet
description:
Disney's Treasure Planet is a 3D action-adventure platform game for the PlayStation played from a behind view perspective that is based on the 2002 movie of the same name. The game follows Jim Hawkins and his search for the legendary treasure of pirate captain Flint.

In the game, the player takes control of Jim and has to navigate him through the different levels. The player has the ability to jump and fight enemies. Jims‚Äôs shape-shifting pet, Morph can be used as a glider to jump farther. In some sections of the game the player has to navigate Jim on his solar surf plank or a boat and avoid obstacles.

name: Floppy Bird
description: Floppy Bird is a re-implementation of Flappy Bird using ChaiLove.

name: Flame Zapper Kotsujin
description: Flame Zapper Kotsujin is a vertical shooter which takes place in outer space. The player controls a fighter spacecraft, advancing through five large levels swarming with enemies (space ships, turrets, tanks, etc.), each culminating with a boss battle. The spacecraft is armed with primary and secondary weapons (fired simultaneously), as well as powerful bomb attacks. Each of these comes in three varieties distinguished by color: red, yellow, and purple. The red group of weapons focuses on spraying fire in different directions; the yellow group contains powerful weapons without covering much of the screen; the purple group is composed of homing lasers and missiles. Power-ups usually stay on screen for a while, changing their color properties.

name: Wanted Raccoon
description: Wanted Raccoon is a 3rd person raccoon simulator with a storyline and extensive research space. Steal food, ride a skateboard, be inconspicuous, fight with people, create equipment, upgrade skills, lead resistance and find a kidnapped family!

name: Monster Prom: Hotseat Edition
description: You have 3 weeks to get a date for Monster Prom! Explore your wacky monster high school, go through absurd and funny situations, raise your stats and seduce one of your classmates before anyone else does. Beautiful art, bold, unapologetic dialogue and hard choices make up this Multiplayer (1-4 players) Dating Sim.

name: Project Canopy
description: Project Canopy is a first person sci-fi survival adventure set in an alien jungle planet. Harvest, Build, Craft and Explore among the massive trees, plants and terrain to see what the jungle holds inside.

name: Start Again: A Prologue
description: A small RPG in which players must guide Siffrin, who is stuck in a time loop.

name: Touhou Kouryuudou: Unconnected Marketeers
description: Touhou Kouryuudou: Unconnected Marketeers is the eighteenth official installment of the Touhou Project. It was announced by ZUN on the Touhou Project news blog Touhou Yomoyama News, February 2021. A playable demo is scheduled for release on March 21st the same year, at Reitaisai 18, and the full version is scheduled to be released in May.

name: Qpang
description: A korean first person shooter called Qpang / MangaFighter

name: Fairy Tail: Brave Saga
description: In this Puzzle RPG, a party of up to five characters from the Fairy Tail series are utilized to complete quests. Through a sequence of turn-based battles, the player uses their touchscreen to match the same color Lacrima to build up attacks. The greater number of Lacrima chained in a set amount of time, the stronger the units' actions become.

name: Fairy Tail: DiceMagic
description:
Based on the popular series Fairy Tail, DiceMagic features an original, game-exclusive story where a mysterious magic called "DICE" controls fate and is stealing away people's freedom.

With the Ishgar peninsula in a state of emergency, the Magic Council sends out a large-scale request to the Guilds in Fiore to help release everyone from DICE's control.

Entrusted with a "Dice Lacrima" the player goes on an adventure with Natsu, Lucy and their friends to save the afflicted mages, earning rewards and new party members along the way.

name: Complex Sky
description: Complex Sky is a vertical, automation, floating, flippable city-building simulation in the sky

name: Sun Haven
description: Sun Haven is a multiplayer fantasy farming sim with dragons, magic, a main questline, RPG-style skill progression, and even a final boss. Farm, fish, fight, mine, smith, cook, and craft in this cozy farming RPG!

name: Fairy Tail: Brave Guild
description:
An web-based RPG where one partakes in a variety of events in order to gather different rarity cards containing unique art of characters from the Fairy Tail series.

By collecting and combining various cards, the player can gain experience and level up their personal deck to create a stronger effect that greatly affects the success of battles. It's also possible to collaborate with friends in monthly defense and subjugation raids to help raise the group's guild rank and become a top magic guild in the game.

Note: can also be accessed through the GREE („Ç∞„É™„Éº) app on Android or iOS.

name: HoneyWorks Premium Live
description: HoneyWorks Premium Live is a rhythm game based around the popular 'Confession Executive Committee' series. Songs and characters from the original story as well as other sub-franchises HoneyWorks have created ‚Äî Dolce and a handful of PVs made for CHiCO with HoneyWorks ‚Äî are in the game. Premium Live also comes with recolored and remastered versions of the earlier songs' original PVs.

name: Voids Adrift
description:
Voids Adrift¬Æ is a Player Crafted Multiplayer, 
 
You start in the Void Salvaging Ships from Sunken lost ships and build your way into the sky where you live out your days until you get sent back into the void, 
 
You start in the pitch black void. An ashy fog rolls about you. The only thing in sight are a few faintly glowing void shards with metals floating around them. Using a torch to scavenge up some metals near the closest shard, you craft components to make a basic raft and float up out of the darkness on your boat. 
 
You see an island and travel there. A group of Dwarves called the Fwaran cautiously greet you. They talk of the dangerous Bransellian living in the desert. They eye you suspiciously. Will you help them? You hear murmurs about travelling to the snow. Apparently the tools they need to win a war are there. What war are they talking about? Impressive steam ships chug along nearby like trains in the sky, billowing massive clouds. As you stare back at your dinghy, you wonder if it's time for an upgrade to a new frame, or if you should just slap on a few more engines and get going. 
 
Voids Adrift includes a skill tree of various fighting styles, with gun-play, sword, and bombardier as unique play-styles. 
 
You can see dozens of players roaming about and the world feels like it's breathing. Shots pop off back and forth in the distance. 
 
Build on the Seas, Clouds, Sky and Islands. 
 
Choose your destiny!

name: Floppy Minecraft
description: It's Minecraft, but with realistic physics. Mobs are floppy and blocks fall realistically instead of floating.

name: Cave Bad
description: Embark on a new roguelike adventure starring Oratio the Dwarf!

name: Phantom Rose Scarlet
description: Fight and collect powerful cards as Reina, a maid exploring a mansion ravaged by evil creatures.

name: Eczema Angel Orifice
description: The only game that will turn you into a woman. A compilation of award-winning hypertext fiction by Porpentine Charity Heartscape.

name: Some Peace of Mind
description:
You wake up in the middle of the night and you find yourself in your room, but everything feels out of place. It seems like your brother locked your computer, messed with your stuff and left clues all around to help you decrypt the password. But why would he do that? And why does your room seems so weird?

Features:
* Inventory and logic based puzzles
* A room full of objects to interact with
* Over 150 scenes, comprising of real photographs carefully shot and retouched to provide a fluid gaming experience
* Over 100 sound effects, plus ambient sounds and original music
* A 90‚Äôs classic, 2d first person navigation system with multitouch support
* An enticing story, with or without a plot twist
* Made almost entirely by a single developer (can‚Äôt get much more indie than that)

Some Peace Of Mind is a remastered version of the same-titled game released back in 2011 exclusively for PCs, before ‚Äúescape rooms‚Äù were cool. This version was built from the ground up for iPad & iPhone and features many enhancements, including a new story, new ending, new puzzles, new scenes, new inventory items, new music etc.

name: OvO
description: OvO is a short skill-based platformer that requires you to run, jump, dive, and slide your way through levels.

name: Guardians Frontline
description: Guardians Frontline is a Sci-Fi VR shooter where you wield powerful weapons and command robot armies that help you fight off enemies in single-player, co-op, and PvP game modes. Complete with a campaign, an in-game level editor and hundreds of community created maps.

name: Minecraft Lovehunt
description: Minecraft Lovehunt is a free-to-play visual novel that was made to celebrate Valentine's Day with the Dream Team fanbase! With 9 endings to go through, I sure hope you're in for a ride.

name: SJ-19 Learns to Love!
description: SJ-19 Learns to Love is a short metroidvania about a killer robot who learns to love~  Explore, defeat bosses, and gain the power of LOVE!

name: Unhatched
description: Unhatched is a story driven card game with a unique mechanic where every card has different effects depending on how you swipe it. You‚Äôll play as a dragon trainer reclaiming their freedom through a pact with a mysterious rescuer. What starts innocently with opening a jar of pickles, will end up testing the limits of your wit and bond you create with your dragon!

name: Slime 64
description:
Slime 64 is a 3D collect-a-thon platformer inspired by retro classics!

Play as air, fire, water, and earth slimes, in any order you'd like, as they meet each other on their journey and combine their powers to save the world from the diabolical Wurltson and his ever-expanding robotic enterprise. The Golden Keys, and assorted Bells and Whistles, will unlock new worlds to explore as you amass your strength in numbers (and your pile of goodies).

name: Edda Caf√©
description: Edda Caf√© is a visual novel made by Mushroomallow. It's a cute and heartwarming, yet unusual Valentine-theme love story for Valentine VN Jam 2021 event.

name: Wizard Card Game
description: The Original Wizard Card Game is a trick-taking card game similar to Whist, Spades, or Euchre. The addition of 4 Wizard Cards and 4 Jester Cards adds an unparalleled level of strategy to the game.

name: Nightmare Temptation Academy
description: Seduce your classmates while the world around you crumbles! Resist temptation while attempting sanity! Go to prom and become a decadent slave to your desires! Confront mortality and make erotic fan art! Rap battle to save your soul! Cease to exist but make it sexy!

name: ChessLocke
description:
ChessLocke is an indie strategy game that adds RPG elements to Chess.
Your pieces gain experience points, level ups, and new abilities to unlock and upgrade as you progress through a campaign where every game is unique.

name: Seinfeld: The Telltale Series
description: Play as Jerry in this new exciting adventure game. This game features stunning 3D type graphics that will blow your mind away. Make your way though a complex dialogue tree with TWO different endings (take that Bandersnatch!). Remember, your choices have consequences!

name: Cat Busters: Collections
description:
Created as a free game to let players play with their cats again, Collections is a memorial app for "Cat Busters" whose service had previously ended in March 2018.

This Neko Atsume-style take on the original Cat Busters has the player use canned food to attract cats into the garden to once again help repair the machine that was broken in Dr. Neko's experiment. Every cat appearance will net the player a coin, and each repair on the machine utilizing these coins gives another can of cat food.

A kitty photo album not only fills up with images of each unique cat the player sees, but also allows them to see all of the animations from the original game. New cats exclusive to Collections will also appear.

name: Hamster All-Stars
description: Horse betting is out: hamster betting is in. Build crazy race tracks for cute hamsters, then bet on who will to earn credits. Use these credits to unlock all kinds of cool objects, like bumpers, funnels & tubes.

name: Tales We Tell Ourselves
description: A short game made for Bitsy Haiku Jam.

name: Puzzle Box Palace
description: Puzzle Box Palace is an escape room style puzzle game where you are pulled into your grandfather's magical puzzle box. Solve puzzles, manipulate the puzzle box, and jump across furniture as you look for a way out.

name: Saints Row: Double Pack
description:
A fully dynamically lit world: Car headlights and muzzle flashes light up the world of Saint's Row 
Next Gen shaders allow the creation, in real-time, of effects previously reserved for movies 
Pedestrians react to your actions and remember who you are. Fail to represent, and other gang members will lose respect for you. Bling up your latest car, wear expensive clothes and women will notice you 
Limitless Customization. Play as fully customizable characters that are male, female or something in between. 
Multiplayer, Co-op full story campaign has seamless integration (for example one player drives while the other shoots).

name: Get Together
description:
Get Together is a coop puzzle adventure for two players. Follow the story about a luckless explorer who gets split into two beings. You and a friend take control of these two parts and your goal is as simple as trying to get them back together!
All puzzles are specifically designed to be played by two people. You both have to exchange information about what you can find in your world, because it sure seems like you two don‚Äôt see the same‚Ä¶

Here‚Äôs the best part! You can play cross-platform with your mobile devices and no internet connection is needed. The only thing that's required is the ability to communicate with your partner. Via discord, zoom, skype, classic landline or even old-school ‚Äòsitting next to each other‚Äô, the means are certainly there!

name: For Sparta
description: One million Persians invaded Greece and only you can stop them in this fast-paced single-screen arena roguelike with +200 gameplay-changing items. Die for freedom! Die For Sparta!

name: Sega GT 2002 / Jet Set Radio Future
description: Special edition game bundled with specially marked Xbox consoles. Both games are in a single disc.

name: Bloodmoon Church
description: Bloodmoon Church is a 90s VHS Found Footage horror inspired by 80/90s retro horror movies and realistic situations.

name: Teen Titans Battle Blitz
description: A Macromedia Shockwave fighting game released by Cartoon Network in 2003 to promote Teen Titans.

name: The Powerpuff Girls: Fast and Flurrious
description: A snowboarding game released via Cartoon Network Powerplay, a service players could use to download games with limited availability. The Powerpuff Girls: Fast and Flurrious was eventually uploaded to the Cartoon Network site for online play, and now has a home on Boomerang.

name: Home Sweet Home: Survive
description:
Home Sweet Home: Survive is an asymmetrical game that consists of 1 Specter hunting 4 survivors in an arena. There are two core gameplays depended on the role players take.

The Specter is to strategically hunt 4 Survivors letting no one escape, and not being killed by survivors. Each Specter will have different stats and special abilities offering various ways of hunting survivors.

The survivors have to cooperate to complete the objective. Each character will have different stats and unique abilities supporting each role of play - decoy, damage, or perform the rituals. Things will drastically change after the objective is completed. The game will test personal dilemma choosing either teaming up to eliminate the Specter or saving own self by leaving the arena.

name: Gloam
description: In Gloam, the player embodies a small candle which must in order to survive, steal light from other players. The confrontation is done via mini-games of logic and speed. The last of the 10 participants to still have the light wins.

name: Magic Traps
description: Magic Traps will take you to the world of extraordinary dungeon adventure. Easy to master but it becomes more addictive and engaging as you go ahead.

name: Battle Mine Sweeper
description:
The classic PC game "Minesweeper" is now available as a battle type! 
Embark on an adventurous journey in quest mode, strengthening the skills you learn as you fight!

name: Dwarf Journey
description: Dwarf Journey is an action roguelite platformer with randomly generated levels. Defeat enemies, level up, assemble your rune build and collect minerals to forge better equipment on an epic journey in search of immortality.

name: The Radiants
description: The Radiants is a magical adventure visual novel with light stat raising & multiple endings. Choose what kind of Oracle you will become and maybe find romance along the way.

name: Humpty's Scramble
description:
This game was made to promote the western-Canadian family restaurant chain "Humpty's" and their Kids' Club.  
 
In this 1998 DOS platformer, Humpty must rescue his little buddy Hammlet from an evil wizard by traversing various areas including a forest, a marine cave, a mountain, and a maze-like castle. 
 
The game was sold and distributed for free at certain locations. Despite having a rather limited release, it impressively touted pre-rendered 3D visuals and a first-person 3d maze in its final area.

name: PixelJunk Raiders
description: SOS! Tantal is under attack by fiendish aliens bent on harvesting the population's life force! Shake off that hypersleep and slash, smash, raid and rescue your way through hundreds of unique missions, all while unraveling the mystery of the enigmatic Keepers. Use State Share to share stages with the turrets, mines and other imprints you've left behind, or jump into another mercenary's stage and use their imprints to your strategic advantage.

name: Alice and You in the planet of numbers
description: Walk as many numbers as there are written in the direction you are trying to go. This is a whole new puzzle game based on a very simple idea! Can you achieve 100% and get a donut from King Donut?

name: Super Raft Boat
description: The world's been flooded, and all you have is your Super Raft Boat. You keep sailing, hoping to find an island while fighting off the creatures of the sea. Can you reach the last island?

name: Tiny Whoop GO
description: Tiny Whoop GO micro drone racing simulator, created in collaboration between Tiny Whoop & Rotor Rush to enable the network of Tiny Whoop clubs around the world to run professional online events and funflys while real-world meet-ups are on hold.

name: Pien
description: Pien is a horror game based on the popular Japanese meme "pien", or "pleading face" emoji.

name: RoboCop 2
description: RoboCop 2 is a platform shooter video game based on the 1990 film of the same name.

name: Castlehold
description: Castlehold is an innovative competitive strategy game, featuring the new Active Resource Control (ARC) System. Build your Army, lead your troops into Battle and see how you stack up against your opponent in fast-paced, strategic combat.

name: The Lost Cube
description: The Lost Cube is a challenging platformer which takes inspiration from classic titles such as Super Meat Boy and Celeste. The story unravels in a small village nestled somewhere in northern Europe. Each day, a special melody is played upon a magical guitar bringing prosperity upon the land.

name: A Walk, the Morning After the Storm
description: There's a story people tell around here.

name: Spanky's Quest
description: Welcome to Mopoland, where the evil witch Morticia has cast an evil spell and turned all the fruits of the mighty kingdom into fiendish monsters. Spanky, our primate hero is on a quest. Armed with his magic ball, Spanky must hunt down Morticia through six grueling levels to liberate Mopoland, and save it‚Äôs citizens from a certain famine.

name: SingStar: Deutsch Rock-Pop
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: SingStar: Deutsch Rock-Pop vol 2
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Osher Bli Gvulot
description:
Osher Bli Gvulot is the first full-length Israeli adventure game created with AGS. It contains 10 hours of gameplay with 2 hours of original music and voice speech. The game's hero is Osher, a 30-yo Israeli guy trying to get elected as Israel's next prime minister.

The game is offered for free, it does not require installation or registration, and is expected to work on any computer.

name: Aliens: Fireteam Elite
description: Set in the iconic Alien universe, Aliens: Fireteam Elite is a cooperative 3rd-person survival shooter that drops your fireteam of hardened marines into a desparate fight to contain the evolving Xenomorph threat. Create and customize your own Colonial Marine, choosing from an extensive variety of classes, weapons, gear and perks, battling overwhelming odds in this heart-pounding survival shooting experience.

name: Combat Mission Cold War
description:
Combat Mission Cold War is set in the tipping-point years of a conflict that gripped the world for 45 years. Between 1979-1982, both the NATO and Soviet Warsaw Pact militaries began the shift away from industrialized warfare of the early 20th century and towards the modern digital battlefield of today. Combat Mission Cold War simulates several ‚Äúwhat if‚Äù conflict scenarios between US and Soviet forces centered on the strategic Fulda Gap and environs in West Germany.

The game also simulates the early days of the US National Training Center (NTC) as US forces began to rapidly transform away from Vietnam era doctrine and towards the revolutionary AirLand Battle concepts that would define warfare in the modern era.

Combat Mission Cold War is intended to be a sandbox for experimentation, for example how would a situation unfold when equipped with M-60A3s or M1s in 1982 facing off against T-80s? How about the same situation with M-60A1s or M-60A2s in 1979 against T-64s or T-62s? The game allows a player to do just that!

name: Eramthgin
description: Eramthgin was a game made in 2 weeks, using the DC Tech Three game engine, and was originally released on halloween of 2011 on yoyogames.

name: Eramthgin 2
description: Eramthgin 2 was released in July 18th, 2013, using a new engine and original soundtrack composed by John S. Weekley.

name: Hurt
description: Hurt is a large Doom map to be played with GZDoom

name: Doom 4 Vanilla
description: Doom 4 Vanilla is a gameplay modification for Doom II intended to recreate the feel of the 2016 DOOM reboot.

name: Code: Dino-H
description: Code: Dino-H is a dinosaur themed survival horror game inspired by Dino Crisis developed by Jim Gennisson.

name: Separation
description: Developed by solo indie game developer Recluse Industries, Separation is first person adventure at its most ambient and atmospheric. A meditation on solitude, loss, and the spiritual path, Separation is a unique journey to a place of epic desolation.

name: Lt. Typhon
description: A Final Doomer-esque mod starring a battlescarred badass with ridiculous firepower! While not as overpowered as Russian Overkill or Baradoom, it makes Plutonia less of a bullshit challenge, while adding a few challenges of its own. Mancubus fireballs burst into a hail of flame, revenant rockets are a little faster and home better but can be shot out of the air if your aim is good (and grabbed too!) Cyberdemon rockets are faster and can also be grabbed, but only if your timing's just right.

name: Super Mario 64 FPS
description: Super Mario 64 FPS is a fan game made in Unity which recreates Super Mario 64, but giving Mario guns and a first-person view.

name: Bard Harder!
description: BARD HARDER! is a tabletop-inspired visual novel game about saving your friends from the Big Bad Evil Guy by using your strongest weapon: romance! So brush up on your pick-up lines and prepare some sexy tunes‚Ä¶what‚Äôs the worst that could happen?

name: The Caribbean Sail: Route Planing
description:
The world is now open for exploration. Each new location features a unique song, new artwork, trade values, locals to converse with, and surprises along the voyage to them! Travel the globe and visit them all!
Survive a voyage to Nassau and become a Pirate that does as he pleases or become a Privateer for the Royal Navy and receive a letter of marque to hunt those filthy pirate scallywags.

name: The Caribbean Sail: Fantasy Toggle
description: Fantasy Toggle is the second free expansion which gives you the option of exploring another storyline and a world filled with monsters, legends, mysteries! Treasure hunting, plank walking, and kraken combat were also added along with new professions and even steamships!

name: Soundless: A Modern Salem in Remote Area
description: A short denpa horror visual novel.

name: GMDX
description: GMDX takes the classic experience of Deus Ex, and enhances the original material to bring the game forward into the contemporary gaming space, while staying true to the creators‚Äô original vision.

name: Power of Ten
description: A single star fighter trying to save as many civilians as possible before they are overrun by a marauder armada. You'll need to gather new weapons, upgrade your ship, find resources, trade with other ships and more to overcome the challenge before you.

name: For a Vast Future
description: War has ended in Seralia, but the scars are far from healed. Explore a dystopian landscape and build weapons from scrap parts to use in battle. Recruit companions and travel in style in your trusty motorbike as you uncover the depths of a deep government conspiracy. The future is vast.

name: Stonefly
description: Harness the wind and soar through the wilderness of Stonefly, a chill and tranquil action-adventure game about self-discovery, legacy, and belonging. Glide your mech strategically among beautiful flora and dangerous fauna, confronting hungry bugs, adventures, and memorable characters.

name: Automatic RP‚Ä™G
description:
Automatic RPG is the RPG where you can let your Heroes do their own thing. Why? Well, because in this game, Heroes level up and earn EXP all by themselves! 
 
All you have to do is spurn them along from time to time and watch them grow into full-fledged Heroes!

name: Hannah
description:
Hannah is a puzzle platformer horror survival game. You play as Hannah, a teenager born in the 80s, who tries to understand her personality by taking an internal journey to her childhood and discovering what went wrong.

You will immerse yourself in the depths of this dreamlike reality in which Hannah will have to be cunning, to solve puzzles; use the elements at your disposal to create devices and vehicles and avoid dying on the way.

name: Ascendshaft and Endless Shaft
description:
2 games in one Ascendshaft and Endless Shaft

Ascendshaft:
While exploring deep underground caves on an alien planet, worldwide seismic activity triggers a cave in which leaves only one narrow channel of ascent

A tale of action, horror, romance.... and betrayal

Endless Shaft:
Take control of the Perpetually Descending Man as he plummets ever downwards in five never ending shafts, each providing a unique challenge.

Avoid bats, rocks, missiles and more.

Compete to achieve the highest score on the online leaderboards (android version only).

Procedurally generated levels.

Special boulder throw and dive abilities add more nuance to the gameplay than you would expect.

Fearsome boss level to be unlocked.

name: Uncharted Waters IV with Power-Up Kit - HD Version
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Tandis
description: Tandis is a 3D puzzle game where you discover mind-bending geometrical shapes.

name: Otome Riron to Sono Shuuhen Bon Voyage
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Crystal Raiders VR
description:
Crystal Raiders VR is a multiplayer Virtual Reality game with action-filled adventures in various ancient castle levels. Enter the maze-like fortification filled with guards, traps, puzzles and treasures and use your problem solving skills and cunning to survive through the levels.

Complete a set of handcrafted levels, fight the crystal guardians of the castle with the weapon of choice, and unravel the mysteries of the forgotten Wizard Lord. Be it alone or with your friends, you can fight your way through the castles avoiding traps and revealing secrets.

name: Cyber Troopers: Virtual On x Toaru Majutsu no Index - Toaru Majutsu no Dennou Senki
description:
Get in the Virtualoid cockpit, take your weapon, and prepare for an ultra-violent-post-modern battle, because YES, Virtual-On has returned! InToaru Majutsu no Virtual-On, a new generation of 50-foot mechas are ready to battle hard, but this time they‚Äôll be equipped with magical powers. We‚Äôre not joking, indeed this new chapter is a crossover game with the light novel series ‚ÄúToaru Majutsu no Index‚Äù published by Dengeki Bunko.

Use the combat systems strategically to reduce your challengers into a molten mass of twisted metal, more you‚Äôll win and more money you‚Äôll earn to develop and improve your machine‚Äôs parts and abilities to pilot the deadliest war machine into the heart of intense battles.

name: Hamidashi Creative
description: Hamidashi Creative is a romantic visual novel with a school setting.

name: Monster Hunter Frontier G6
description: Season 6 of Monster Hunter Frontier G series.

name: Candy Land: A Child's First Game Comes to Life
description:
The Candy Land computer game is a version of the classic board game brought to life and enhanced. 
 
One player can play against a computer opponent, or up to 4 people can take turns. To advance, a player clicks on a machine which produces a piece of colored candy. The player is allowed to move to the next space that shares the same color as the candy which was just drawn. Some spaces are sticky and if a player lands on one, they will lose one or more turns. Some pieces contain special candies which will cause a player to warp to different areas on the board, which may be either ahead or behind of the player's current space. 
 
In addition to playing the classic board game, this game offers the player side trips to explore 8 different areas, each with fun activities: 
 
Gingerbread Plum Trees: Help Plumpy (the last of the Plumpa trolls) collect plums for pies. Do this by clicking on him to tickle him so he'll surrender a plum. 
 
Licorice Castle: Lord Licorice has a telescope mounted atop his castle through which you can view the whole of Candy Land. 
 
Peppermint Forest: Mr. Mint, the royal lumberjack, tutors you in how to make freeform music on a hodgepodge of instruments. 
 
Gumdrop Mountains: Jolly, the official Gumdrop Mountain Greeter, enlists your help to restore color to the Gumdrop Mountains. Do this by selecting gumdrop colors that Jolly can place in his spoon-shaped catapult to launch toward the mountain. 
 
Peanut Brittle House: Help Grandma Nut grow candy by planting seeds of chocolate chips, caramel chunks, etc. in mounds and watering them. Also, help her redecorate her house. 
 
Lollipop Woods: Princess Lolly offers the opportunity to help decorate lollipops with designs that come from a coloring machine that the player can control. 
 
Ice Cream Sea: Create an enormous ice cream sundae and then request that the fairy set it adrift on the ice cream sea to be devoured wholesale by a whale. 
 
Molasses Swamp: Gloppy, the curator of the swamp, is just happy to see the player. Children will have fun interacting with the surroundings.

name: Jurisdiction
description: Take control of a metropolitan police department and run it your way. Recruit, train, and equip officers, then send them to the streets to fight crime and keep peace in the city of Freemont.

name: Berserker
description:
Side scroller game with story-driven elements, based in old Viking age before all known written sagas and scripts, we follow Asbjorn as he must save and protect what he cares the most for.

This game is violent and has zero respect for the bad guys. You, as Asbjorn who is retired Viking warrior, blessed by gods with Rage rune which he must control and use only when needed are stuck in the situation nobody want¬¥s to be. He must use his axe and shield or axes to reach out of situation he did not want to be in.

name: Air Command 3.0: Airport Expansion Set
description: This is an add-on for Air Command 3.0 and adds 34 airports from all over the world, e.g Bahamas, Berlin or Rio de Janeiro.

name: Joy the Pug
description:
But it‚Äôs more than just a game. It‚Äôs passion. A single dude with a small budget and help from a few creative friends trying to conquer this world. You can be among the first people to join them in this promising journey!

Embark on this colorful and joyful adventure starring one brave puppy and his helpful flying droid partner as they fight the fuzzy invaders. Avoid enemies, jump over traps, shoot the incoming swarms of kittens‚Äîand save the Universe.

name: Shadow Gunner: The Robot Wars
description: In a hellish mechanical future, the latest generation of robots are fighting a self-destructive war of attrition. Command your war machine in the hyper realistic 3D worlds. Power up your weapons. 15 missions and only one way to survive: destroy the enemy.

name: BattleDudes.io
description: BattleDudes.io is a 2D multiplayer browser shooter with fully destructible terrain. The game features multiple distrinct game modes and maps to play in. In your arsenal you have dozens of weapons, grenades, special tools and perks to choose from. The main feature of the game is the destructable buildings, which allow for creative tactical descisions to be made. The map also evolves over time as more and more of it gets destroyed. Bigger maps include driveable vehicles like jeeps and tanks.

name: Sky Fleet
description: Take to the skies as part of the Sky Fleet, defend sacred floating islands, build strong bases and towers to protect their resources, as well as shoot down waves of rogue drones trying to strip-mine them!

name: Gravity Mastery
description:
A perspective-disorienting puzzler where the definition of down is yours to decide. Change to flow of gravity to complete each of The Adviser's varied, but logical tests. Can you become proficient enough to control the six directions and master gravity? 
 
The current master of gravity, The Adviser, has created a gauntlet of trials to test all those who believe that they are deserving of being the new master of gravity. Any and all challengers are welcome to try their hands and engage their mind in the worlds devised to confuse and disorient. 
 
The rules are simple. Each trial consists of several red cubes and green spheres. Once every red cube simultaneously contains a green sphere, then the trial has been successfully completed. 
 
- Campaign - A series of hand-crafted levels with a progressing level of difficulty. 
- Compounding Game Mechanics - Compete in levels with an ever-expanding list of possible game mechanics. 
- Time Trial - Race against the clock to beat the par time for a level in time trial mode. 
- Minimalistic Art - An art style where every resource at your disposal is visually apparent and clearly defined.

name: UnearthU
description: UnearthU is a 7 day multimedia experience about self-improvement, healing, and transformation. Made by reusing found digital materials, the game consists of found footage videos, discussions with an A.I., guided meditations, writing reflection prompts, and a habit tracker.

name: 2econds to Starlivht: Forever My Diamond
description:
As graduation looms, true feelings begin to surface. Will Grace find the courage to overcome her shyness and bare her heart to Sera, or will her handsome rival Akira get to her first? A free VN about being really gay for your best friend.

Part of the Noisz series, and prequel to Noisz Starlivht.

name: 2econds to Starlivht: My Heart's Reflection
description:
"The day I put that uniform on, I saw myself in the mirror for the first time. And I dared to think, maybe, just maybe..." A free VN about standing up to the world to be yourself.

Part of the Noisz series, and prequel to Noisz Starlivht.

name: Big Buck World
description: Big Buck World was the 10th anniversary edition of Big Buck Hunter. It contains Big Buck Hunter Pro & Safari in one cabinet, as well as the respective Open Season & Outback upgrades.

name: Smashy Road: Wanted 2
description: You are wanted! How long can you stay on the run? Find out in this epic car chasing simulator!

name: Series: Your Story Universe
description: Your choices determine the outcome of your favorite stories like Vanderpump Rules, Law & Order, Saved by the Bell, The Breakfast Club, Sixteen Candles, Xena: Warrior Princess and more! Enjoy the official storytelling game from NBCUniversal and get hooked on the exciting episodic adventure alongside your favorite characters and reality TV celebrities!

name: Second Chance
description: Second Chance is a 2D, Top-view, turn-based JRPG. Based on the same planet as "The Story Of Hyk" ebooks, Skettaria. This game has been made by the one person Dr Hyk

name: Affinity
description: Follow a young, questioning MtF person on a journey through the dreamscape as they discover who they truly are.

name: Urania's Cloak
description:
Play the role of a teenage trans girl, exploring her love of astronomy and reflecting on her life on the edge of reality. 
 
The game will take 30-45 minutes to complete for the first time. It also supports fullscreen, windowed and borderless windowed modes, and uses only royalty-free music, so it's streamer friendly. 
 
Content warning 
The storyline of this game deals with suicide. If you wish, you can still play the game without the story elements.

name: GangV: Battle Royale
description:
GangV is an online Battle Royale game in a living environnement with policemen and civilians.
It is possible to steal cars, mug people in the street and fight with the police during a Battle Royale and in the Open World mode.
Players can control territory to earn money and the help of gangsters.
It can be played both in Virtual Reality and in non-VR.

name: Knot Fiction!
description: The second couple project following Harmon Ey is a work that focuses on flirting with an older bride!

name: Mega Man: Rock N Roll
description: A mysterious robot force is invading the city and abducting Robot Masters. Proto Man and Mega Man both succumb to the terror leaving Roll alone and scared. Back at Dr. Light's lab Roll decides to go through the procedure her brother did to become a super fighting robot.

name: Yumeutsutsu Re:Master Bundle Pack
description: Yumeutsutsu Re:Master Bundle Pack is a physical bundle including both the Yumeutsutsu Re:Master base game and Yumeutsutsu Re:After.

name: R√©ussir: Code de la Route - Nouvelle √©dition
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Instant Sports Tennis
description:
Instant Sports Tennis is an innovative and fun way to play tennis with your family and friends. Play with motion gaming and move your Joy-Cons just as a tennis racket! 
 
Challenge elements with storms on the field, smash walls in an Arkanoid-ish play style, master the gravity‚Ä¶ and don‚Äôt forget to work your lesson with the Maths mini-game. 
 
Play with up to 4 players simultaneously, smashes, lobes, the field type is now having an impact on the gameplay, 10 challenging and entirely new mini-games. 
 
Instant Sports Tennis is the most complete casual and arcade game dedicated to tennis on Nintendo Switch.

name: The Cruel King and the Great Hero
description: This game is an RPG starring the human child Yuu, who longs to become a "hero," and the dragon "Overlord" who fosters her.

name: Liong: the Lost Amulets
description: Long ago five magical amulets were treasured by Oriental wise men. These amulets held the five natural elements in balance. Restore harmony to nature by finding the lost amulets. Liong: The Lost Amulets is a combination of hidden object games and tile-matching puzzles and also has a variety of mini games. Along your journey you`ll visit hundreds of unique locations and collect power-up pearls. Reveal the magic spells and restore the sparkling gems of the magical amulets.

name: Liong: the Dragon Dance
description: It's Mahjong with a Puzzle Twist! The magical Liong dragons have been stolen and you must save the day. Use your matching skills to stop the Liongs before they reach the gate! Along your journey, you'll visit hundreds of unique locations and collect an assortment of beautiful masks, amazing awards, and clever fortunes. Featuring 2 game modes, 100+ levels of game play, beautiful graphics, and dancing Chinese dragons.

name: Taxer Inc.
description: The biggest corporations are not Apple or Amazon. The biggest "corporations" are the states. Your employees are all citizens of the country. You don't pay them a salary - they will pay you themselves. You manage taxes and collect them.

name: Fall Balance Ball
description:
Indie platformer in a 3D setting.
Balance on platforms, jump and pass barriers. Collected crystals will give you super powers.

name: Ignis Universia: Eternal Sisters Saga DX
description: Ignis Universia: Eternal Sister Saga is a short but epic visual novel/JRPG made for Ludum Dare 45 by a small team in Tampere, Finland.

name: Doom City
description:
Doom City is a single-level PWAD for Doom II that came out in December 1995. It was designed by Shamus Young and uses his own custom music track.

Doom City was featured in Doomworld's Top 100 Most Memorable Maps, placing 70th.

name: The Silver Case 2425
description: This is a bundle of the hit "The Silver Case HD Remaster" and "The 25th Ward: The Silver Case".

name: Prinny Presents: NIS Classics Vol 1
description: For the first time ever, both Phantom Brave and Soul Nomad & the World Eaters are coming to Nintendo Switch! New and old fans alike can experience two classic titles from the NIS vault of RPG hits, complete with unique gameplay mechanics, memorable characters, up-scaled artwork, and all DLC from the original releases!

name: MinuteQues‚Ä™t‚Ä¨
description:
MinuteQuest is a retro-styled, one-finger, time-killing RPG! 
A 2D field where the only choice is to advance or die! 
Kill fearsome enemies, crush immense bosses, level up, acquire riches, and collect ridiculous equipment whilst gradually advancing along the world towards your goal! 
If you've got a bit of pesky time to kill, why not try it out? 
Kill slime, kill time!

name: MinuteDungeon
description:
From the creator of MinuteQuest comes the hotly anticipated MinuteDungeon! 
A classic dungeon-crawler guaranteed to suck you in to its pixelated 2D world, one minute at a time! 
Mysterious labyrinths and fearsome enemies await you.

name: City Maker
description: City Maker is a cross between a city builder and a puzzle game, with endless replay-ability! Try to keep your citizens happy while managing spending but most importantly try to stay mayor as long as possible. City Maker offers engaging city building mechanics with unique challenges to test your city making abilities. Don't forget to check out other players' cities in the "city gallery"!

name: MinuteFrontier
description:
From the creator of MinuteQuest comes the hotly anticipated MinuteFrontier!
A 2D field where the only choice is to advance or die!
Kill fearsome enemies, crush immense bosses, level up.
If you've got a bit of pesky time to kill, why not try it out?
Kill slime, kill time!

name: Goddess of War Ashley
description: Goddess Of War Ashley is a vertical scrolling flying shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter plane to fight the enemy in the air.

name: Destroyer of Worlds
description: Destroyer of Worlds is a 2D platformer game about an adventurer who needs to make his way through dangerous dungeons and to get home.

name: Zabula's Quest
description: Find the sensations of an old-fashioned platform game.

name: Revenot
description:
Revenot is an offline low poly game mix of action RPG and Roguelike.
It features procedurally generated maps in open scenes, making the game feels like a open world RPG, still being light and running smoothly on most mobile devices.

name: Mainichi
description: A short RPG Maker game about a day in the life of developer Mattie Brice.

name: To the Cosmos
description:
Experience a turtle's story about fulfilling their dream. Get to know local creatures and the environment around you as you make your way to the cosmos. 
 
-Explore the Lake and its five different locations accompanied by music from matty2003. 
-Talk to other creatures and collect treasures the Lake has to offer. 
-Take your time, there is no need to rush.

name: Imp of the Sun
description: Restore the Sun‚Äôs light and end the Eternal Eclipse in this 2D fast-paced action-platformer game inspired by Peruvian cultures. Explore hand-crafted environments, battle and improve your skills to defeat the Four Keepers that stole the power of the Sun.

name: Wheel of Fortune
description: A pc version of the popular tv game show.

name: There Shall Be Lancing
description: Dueling game about jousters in the open sky. Commissioned for the NYU Game Center's No Quarter exhibition in 2013.

name: Warfield
description: Single player and multiplayer war game.

name: First Kiss at a Spooky Soiree
description: First Kiss at a Spooky Soiree is a visual novel created for Yuri Jam 2016. You play as Marzipan, a light witch who's gone her whole life without kissing anyone ‚Äî Until Tonight! There are 10 endings with eight characters to kiss.

name: Drowning, Drowning
description: Drowning, Drowning is the story of a young girl who dives into the sea. make your way through the kelp forests and meet the friendly residents of an underwater city... but were you really invited here just for fun? or was there some deeper reason...?

name: Can You Come In?
description:
It's supposed to be your day off. It always happens when it's supposed to be your day off. Your boss from the gas station/convenience store, Shane, always calls you on those days and asks you the same question that isn't a question, so much as a command made politely: 
 
"Can you come in?" 
 
What's different this time is that whether you try to ignore the ringing of the phone or push past your stress and go to pick it up yourself, it wasn't your normal two hands that got their fingers around the smooth plastic of your phone - but a third one, at the end of a fresh arm that grew out of your stomach, forcing you to answer the call.

name: Pet Cats, Save the World
description:
A simple text-based simulator in which you pet cats and, as a result, make the world a better place. 
 
Three endings 
More than 100 randomly generated cats and effects 
Sparkles!

name: The Donald Trump Simulator
description: The Donald Trump Simulator is a small and silly game. It was made in a month based off of a nightmare the developer had. Actually, if you don't want Trump nightmares, then you're better off not playing this game

name: Bernard Arnault Sauve La France
description:
Bernard Arnault Sauve La France is a satirical work and is not intended to explain to anyone how to get out of the crisis linked to Covid-19 (except perhaps Bernard Arnault). 
 
All amounts included in the game are from sources found as of April 29, 2020 and are highly subject to change. Bernard Arnault's fortune in particular, being largely based on stock market values, fluctuates widely. 
 
The orders of magnitude, on the other hand, do not change.

name: This Box Conveys People
description: Years of unresolved debts have led to your arrest. You are on your way to the Crevice, where you will do good, honest work to pay back the people and institutions you owe. Before that, however, you must register, and then you must ride in an elevator for an unusually long time.

name: Tender Frog House
description: A wholesome one-day prototype.

name: The story of the revolutionary watermelon that wanted to live free as a bird and learned how to escape
description:
It's time to rise up for watermelons all over the world!  
This is just the beginning...

name: Dogness
description: These dogs have fallen for a breedist dogmagogue. Will they manage become the purest and most homogeneous dog park by selectively breed themselves and control immigration? Help them achieve their glorious destiny!

name: Crisis Theory
description: In Crisis Theory you play as the spirit of capitalism, as described by the Marxist model of accumulation. Your singular goal is profit. But beware, contradictions abound, and you will have to use every tool at your disposal to avoid falling into crisis!

name: Moloch's Priest
description:
ONCE A MONTH, THE PRIESTLY ORDER GATHERS TO RECEIVE A SACRED SIGN FROM THE ANCIENT ONE: MOLOCH! 
 
As High Priest , your task is to interpret this message, and ultimately to decide who should be sacrificed. You must depend on your advisors, DEXTRA and SINISTRA. But be careful, revolution is at the gates. 
 
Oh, um, and Moloch represents capitalism.

name: A Worker's Guide to Espionage
description:
This game was made over a couple of days for the Organising at Work jam. 
 
It's based on the article Basics of Organising from the IWW.

name: Phantom Brave: The Hermuda Triangle Remastered
description:
In the year of 913, in a world called Ivoire, lives Marona, a 13 year old orphaned girl with a special ability to communicate with phantoms. Her ability brings resentment from others, but cheerful and optimistic Marona is not bothered.

Marona believes in her parents' teachings that people will one day come to like her as long as she stays compassionate and kind. Now Marona travels throughout Ivoire with her guardian, "Ash the Phantom," to resolve disputes around the world.

name: Chef's Tail
description: Chef's Tail is a fantasy adventure RPG. Play as the "Cat Chef" in the spooky but cute underworld. Earn your coin by tending the trees, fishing, and creating incredible dishes, or just sleep for 16 hours a day on a comfy pillow. The choice is yours.

name: Pok√©mon Masters EX
description: Pok√©mon Masters EX (originally named Pok√©mon Masters) is a free-to-play mobile game for Android and iOS developed and published by DeNA. It is based on the Pok√©mon media franchise. Set on the artificial island of Pasio, the game allows players to battle and recruit various prominent Pok√©mon Trainers from the main series games. Originally named Pok√©mon Masters and released in August 2019, it was renamed Pok√©mon Masters EX in August 2020 on the 1st anniversary of the game.

name: Drivrooom
description:
Drivrooom is basically a game where you need to find your current location, while you're at the wheel of a car!

The player loads a video, and gather some clues from it, in order to find the country they're in to gain points

name: PokExp
description:
PokExp is a French Fangame about Pok√©mon, with a large community !

Fight trainers, find shinies and other glowing Pok√©mon, encounter legends in an unique world !

name: Seiya Online
description: A massively multiplayer online role-playing game free-to-play released by Seiya Team. The game combines PvP and PvE in a fantasy game environment.

name: Bubble Spinner
description: Bubble Shooter with a fun twist: the bubbles are on a rotating platform. See if you can knock them all out. Very addicting!

name: Rotor
description: Rotor is a physics-based drone racing arcade providing competitive and fast-paced races through dynamic environments. Fly as fast as you can trying to beat the time or keep up with fast vehicles to shoot the ultimate chase footage.

name: What's Wrong With You?
description: A game show like no other! Find the wrong answers to multiple choice questions! Play alone or let your twitch chat compete against 32 contestants! Earn life points & money with each question and walk away victorious at the end of 8 rounds!

name: F.O.S
description: A low poly open worlds suvival game, with IA in multiplayer.

name: Sleep Tight
description: Sleep Tight is a fast paced action horror game. Survive the waves of monsters if you can, upgrade different weapons to help you. Remember pay attention, listen closely, and don't let them get you!

name: Sectant
description: Sectant is a Blood add-on by Zik of the Russian Blood Community announced on December 27, 2006; later followed up with the stand-alone Sectant 2.

name: Dewdrop Dynasty
description: Run, dash, and crawl your way through a fast, Metroidvania. Battle with giant bosses, find new guns and abilities, meet quirky characters, and most importantly find your way home.

name: The Wayfarer
description: The Wayfarer is not your grandparents' Heretic. It includes a built-in gameplay mod that rebalances the game in ways that are mostly subtle but make the game a lot more engaging to play. Many enemy attacks are more dangerous, and most of the player's weapons are more powerful, allowing certain weapons to have more useful combat niches and eliminating the grindiness associated with vanilla Heretic's weapon/monster balance. The episode also features two new standard enemies, two new artifacts, a new weapon, plenty of custom decorations and textures, and more.

name: Shotgun Symphony
description:
Shotgun Symphony is an episode replacement PWAD for Doom, released in January 2019 by Steve Duff, requiring a Boom-compatible source port. An E1-E2 style maps heavily inspired by Fava Beans, Shotgun Symphony features seamless progression between levels (with each new map's initial area being introduced by the previous map's exit location), creating the impression of a lone, giant facility.

Shotgun Symphony was one of the recipients of the 2019 Cacowards.

name: Marvel 2099: One Nation Under Doom
description: Marvel 2099: One Nation Under Doom was a cancelled game for the PlayStation developed by Mindscape Inc. It was to be loosely based on the "One Nation Under Doom" storyline in Marvel's Doom 2099 comic. It was envisioned as a 2D side-scroller with 3D rendered characters.

name: Assault on Tei Tenga
description: Assault on Tei Tenga, also known as Tei Tenga, is a hub-based mapset for ZDoom created by Sam Ketner. It is widely considered as the first WAD to use the ZDoom hub system inherited from Hexen, combined with ACS-scripted cutscenes, which was not a simple proof of concept. Due to this, it is listed as one of the Top 100 WADs of All Time by Doomworld. Released on May 21, 1999, it originally received mixed responses, with some community members complaining that extensive scripting interfered with Doom's gameplay. Nevertheless, Tei Tenga has been described as "the wad that got ZDoom on its feet".

name: Brave Dwarves 2
description:
It's time to get acquainted with the most complete and reliable story about the brave dwarves' deeds. It took a lot of time for chroniclers to put together all the episodes of the glorious saga. 
 
Now we can see why this war is known as the great and decisive one. It turns out that our heroes have fought in more than a thousand battles during their campaign! The dwarves fought under the Sun and the Moon, in thickets of the magical forest and in tight corridors of the mines. They have been in lots of wonderful and sometimes dreadful places on their way!

name: City of Gangsters
description: Start a crime syndicate from nothing, and grow it into a well-oiled money machine in City of Gangsters, a mafia management simulation game. Build speakeasies and illegal distilleries. Manage production chains and resource distribution. Smuggle goods from out of town and bribe the police to look the other way. Grow a powerful crew and keep your rivals under your thumb. Eliminate competition and rule the city. But most importantly, keep the money flowing.

name: Fit Fantasy
description: A dating sim inspired by 4chan's /fit/ board.

name: Transpire
description: Transpire is a short relaxing first-person 3D-platformer where you can play and progress through the levels at your own pace. See the world slowly take shape while walking, jumping, flying and unlocking abilities on your way.

name: Mitoza
description:
It all starts with a seed. Explore all cycles and prepare yourself to accept the inevitable effects of Mitoza. 
 
Mitoza is a surreal choose-your-own-adventure game by Gal Mamalya, published by Second Maze.

name: Reimagine: The Game
description: Reimagine first greets you with faceless celebrity caricatures hopping around the sides of a square, as you realize the gravity of the situation. Everything around you... is part of the game.

name: Flappy: The Angry Bird
description:
Save Flappy - the Angry Bird from the incoming obstacles in its word. Make it Dodge, fly, glide to strategize its position to combat the incoming obstacles. Isn't the human life resemble the same, when one tries to combat obstacles in life.
Extremely addictive and Challenging game that requires your focus, strategy and patience. Strategize the position of Flappy - the Angry Bird to combat the incoming obstacles. It will not let your fingers and brain to rest.
Persistence, thinking, prompt and appropriate action is the key to score high.

Challenge yourself for how much you can score. Try to beat your High Score.

FEATURES:
-No Ads
-Dynamic Difficulty Level
-Size and Performance optimization
-Limited Time DISCOUNT
-Smooth Pre-performance
-Optimized For PC and Windows
-Highest Score Keeper
-Daily Notification
-Early Bird Discounted Price
-NON VIOLENT
-SUITED FOR KIDS ALSO

name: Earth Defender One
description:
Shooting challenge, look at video gameplay! 
 
Use z,x,c or LMB, MMB, RMB to shoot (Red, blue, green shots), arrow keys for movement 
 
Mac version is Intel and works with M1, you probably need to right click and choose open first time

name: The Bazaar
description: The Bazaar is the first Hero Builder, developed by Tempo. Set in a vibrant, ever-changing galactic marketplace, players assume a role from a roster of unique heroes, trading and upgrading otherworldly items & skills to assemble them into a plethora of combinations used to outplay and defeat opponents.

name: Toasty: Ashes of Dusk
description: Toasty is an Action Adventure RPG starring an unlikely hero. Play as Marshall the Marshmallow Knight, and attempt to stop an all-powerful evil and protect the many friends you make in the magical world of Geldia. All the while, discovering the truth of you own mysterious origins.

name: Puzzle Pedestrians
description:
Puzzle Pedestrians is not your ordinary puzzle game! 
 
Observe and guide pedestrians to help them have a safe time on their way to work, school, or otherwise fulfilling your mission objectives. With your toolkit of items such as bees and bananas, you‚Äôll help moms deliver lunches to forgetful children, deliver more foot traffic to struggling shops, and so much more! 
 
Planned and produced by Kenichi Nishi of Route 24, famous for his work on games such as ‚ÄúMoon: Remix RPG Adventure‚Äù, ‚ÄúL.O.L.: Lack of Love‚Äù, and ‚ÄúChibi-Robo!‚Äù.

name: GraviFire
description: The green fire has been abducted by evil aliens, who force him to solve puzzles for tests. Need to pass all the tests to be able to return the green fire back to his home. You have to brainstorm over 50 levels. Gravity, movement, killing lasers... What else the aliens have prepared?

name: Black Cat
description: Black Cat is an upcoming, fast paced, PvP experience based on Black Jack 21 with a unique twist! Come play with memorable characters in a fast paced card game of skill and luck!

name: Let It Flow
description: This game was made entirely by DevAddict's chat during live streams on Youtube. It's a first of it's kind, a community-made gaming project stitched together by DevAddict, a master of Unreal Engine. It is an intense multiplayer pvp game with several different game modes, fun for the whole family!

name: Do Love Me Seriously! S
description: Majikoi is back and better than ever in this sequel to the hit 2009 visual novel. Majikoi S takes place after the events of Majikoi and lets you choose which of Majikoi's many endings to proceed from. Choose your favorite heroine and enjoy new romantic events with her, or choose to start with no commitment and romance one of 5 new heroines.

name: Spiky
description:
Spiky is a "lose and try again" type of game, you will have to create a path for Spiky, through obstacles, using items available in your inventory. 
16 levels + 1 final level are available. (Levels are getting bigger and harder).

name: EZ2on Reboot: R
description: EZ2on Reboot: R ‚Äì Renowned rhythm game franchise EZ2on‚Äôs latest gem is to be released via Steam! Be ready to soak up all the fun EZ2on has to offer by playing the most popular hits throughout the series.

name: Super Robot Taisen OG: Dark Prison
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: SpellForce 2: Faith in Destiny - Scenario 1: Flink's Secret Diary
description: Order Master Matricus has recorded his secrets of fire magic in a Fire Ledger a powerful artifact. This compendium grants its owner the powers of fire magic. But the orcs have stolen it. Flink McWinter, a famous thief and scoundrel from the SpellForce universe, was hired by Matricus (or so he claims) to steal back the Fire Ledger. He quickly realizes that this will unfortunately not be an easy task, even for a master thief such as he...

name: Pocky & Rocky Reshrined
description:
Pocky & Rocky Reshrined follows the adventures of a young Shinto shrine maiden named Pocky and her companion, Rocky the raccoon, as they take on the Nopino Goblins!

A third sequel in the series, Pocky & Rocky Reshrined is currently being developed by Tengo Project and expected for release on PlayStation 4 and Nintendo Switch in the second half of 2021. Tengo Project consists of staff who worked on the original, as well as Wild Guns: Reloaded and Ninja Saviors: Return of the Warriors.

name: SpellForce 2: Faith in Destiny - Scenario 2: The Golden Fool
description: Ever since Amun Kar invented the game of stones Drakkar, there has been a legend of the golden fool, a stone that was created only once, and defeats every other stone.
