After Carla was defeated in Shadow Wars, she risks everything to find that stone to regain her reputation as Drakkar champion. The search begins in the Tuscari Desert, but she soon realizes that she isn't the only one looking for the fool. A bitter battle for the golden fool soon arises...

name: SpellForce 2: Faith in Destiny - Scenario 3: The Last Stand
description:
Professor Twiddle is on a mission of exploration in Dun Mora. When his journey becomes too dangerous, he brings the parts for the Twiddlium Compensator to Queen Sansha for safekeeping. To be absolutely sure, he also informs Professor Undergant and tells him of his plans. 
 
The Nameless launch their attack on Dun Mora, as mentioned in Faith in Destiny. The elves withstand the first wave of attacks. But it soon turns out that these attacks have a new dimension. So far, all they know is that the attacks come at certain intervals. Play as Caine and help the elves and Queen Sansha to defend their land against the Nameless!

name: SpellForce 2: Faith in Destiny - Scenario Pack
description:
This compilation includes the following DLC (downloadable content) for SpellForce 2: Faith in Destiny: 
 
- SpellForce 2: Faith in Destiny - Scenario 1: Flink's Secret Diary 
- SpellForce 2: Faith in Destiny - Scenario 2: The Golden Fool 
- SpellForce 2: Faith in Destiny - Scenario 3: The Last Stand

name: SpellForce 3: Versus
description:
SpellForce 3: Versus is a a Free-to-play version of SpellForce 3, allowing players to participate in the newly introduced ranked multiplayer as well as play in a skirmish against AI opponents.

In SpellForce 3: Versus, you will be able to play either Humans, Orcs and Elves - and your faction will be randomly chosen for you when you start the game for the first - once an Orc, always an Orc! While fighting against other users of SpellForce 3: Versus, you can also face players from the expansions Fallen God and Soul Harvest - there will be just one big SpellForce 3 player base.

SpellForce 3: Versus will have NO microtransactions, NO advertisement or any other common Free-to-play mechanic. You can play Versus absolutely free of charge, only if you want to have access to the singleplayer campaigns from SpellForce 3, SpellForce 3: Soul Harvest or SpellForce 3: Fallen God, you'll have to buy them.

Additionally, there is a Multiplayer-Upgrade pack available, allowing you to choose from each of the six different SpellForce-factions: Humans, Orcs, Dwarves, Dark Elves, Trolls and Elves.

name: Hello Charlotte: Delirium
description: Welcome back to the House, mr/mrs. Anonymous! In this world, Puppeteers do not exist. In a two-dimensional world without morals, what kind of girl would Charlotte be? Have fun, and bon appetit!

name: Bhop PRO
description: BhopPRO is an amazing game mode where players have to jump on blocks. This game is created to enjoy the gameplay, or to train. There are no victories and winners. Nearly all cards that are used in this mode are designed only for walkthrough. Than the player goes further, moreover, the level becomes more complicated. Here you can play maps on passing with other players, difficulties will cause you interest, and old players will feel nostalgia. Feel new take on the popular bhopping genre.

name: Axe Over It
description:
A game where you control an axe with the objective of climbing as high as you can.  
inspired in "Getting Over It", a frustrating experience.

name: Dude Simulator 3
description: Dude Simulator 3 is an open world sandbox game. It is your friend‚Äôs birthday tomorrow. You have already bought him a present, now you only have to give it to him. But your friends lives in another city, quite far from you. So you are going to make a long trip, and there are lots of adventures waiting for you on your way there: you will have to earn money, communicate with some people, escape from prison, etc. Apart from the plot mode, in this game you can also explore various cities, find money and spend it on different things, ride cars, enter any buildings, buy something, make jokes on people around you, and so on. In general, you can do whatever can be done in real life.

name: El Internado Laguna Negra
description:
The video game follows the structure of the television series, but it is full of extra content, parallel plots and new scripts supervised by the series' writers, so that the end of the game will be an unknown even for the most loyal followers of the plot. from El Internado. In this sense, in the game the relationships between the students will have a very important weight in the development of the game's plot, being able to investigate and discover in first person the dark secret that the Laguna Negra boarding school hides. 
 
During the adventure, it is possible to embody five of the protagonists of the series of the player's choice, these being Carol, Ivan, Marcos, Julia and Vicky. With them, the player aims to explore the scenarios seen in the series while looking for clues and interacting with other characters, in addition to having to overcome various minigames and puzzles that will require the use of the special features of the game. portable such as using the touch screen or microphone. 
 
Regarding the graphic section, the game presents a visual style that combines the two and three dimensions on the upper and lower screen of the laptop, showing all the narrative sequences through black and white scenes in a similar way to those seen in movies such as , for example, Sin City.

name: Dracula vs. The Ninja On the Moon
description:
An all new Interactive FMV game

Based on the real life Underground Cult "bad" movie that has been passed around on DVD-R's and VHS TAPES for years.

Featuring

‚Ä¢ Stylized FMV video
‚Ä¢ Multiple endings
‚Ä¢ Hidden scenes
SYSTEM REQUIRE

name: Flesh Eating Geriatric Internet Predator
description: You are a projectionist tasked with assembling a long lost Horror Film for it‚Äôs first screening ever. A girl obsessed with vampires ends up meeting the real horrifying thing but he's far from the sparkly man of her dreams

name: WWII: Battle Over Europe
description:
WWII Battle Over Europe is the sequel to Pacific Warriors II: Dogfight set during the European theater of World War II.

The game is played from a third person perspective in and lets the player control a fighter plane from either Germany or Britain. Both the British RAF and German Luffwaffe have their own campaign in which the player will battle over Britain and Normandy among others. Players will take on enemy aircrafts as well as ships on the sea. The game offers fifty missions and can be played on three difficulty levels: rookie, veteran and elite.

The battle for control of the skies during wartime Europe produced many heroes. Now it's your chance to fly alongside those World War II aces, battling for dominance across the skies of Britain, Normandy and beyond. The skies of Europe are yours to defend. It's time to do your duty!

name: Space Warlord Organ Trading Simulator
description: Buy, sell, and trade organs in a strange and evolving universe. Dive into the quivering innards of alien capitalism in the sci-fi body horror market tycoon game you didn't know you needed.

name: 3D Morris
description:
3D Morris Prof simulates the famous board game Nine Men's Morris on your PC, including 5 levels from "very easy" to "unbeatable".

A realistic physics engine and advanced real-time graphics with realistic sound make this game to a unique experience.

name: X-Ray & Dilligas
description: Two games on one cartridge. In X-Ray, fire x-ray beams into a grid to find hidden diffusers. In DILLIGAS, compete against the clock or another player as you partially control a bouncing object to capture targets and fill your reservoir.

name: Little Tail Story
description: A free-to-play puzzle RPG game for mobile platforms in the Little Tail Bronx setting.

name: AruaRose
description: AruaROSE is a fantasy MMORPG, Where the goddess Arua has summoned visitors to save the seven episodes from the evil forces of Hebarn.

name: The Snowfield
description:
The Snowfield is an experimental project in emergent narrative set during World War I. It was made by a team of 10 student interns from Singapore and the U.S. in 2011 as part of the eight-week GAMBIT summer development program at MIT.

The Snowfield represents an attempt to make a simulation-based narrative game according to a special method for developing such games, a method designed to avoid the need for complex A.I. or massive content generation. The idea was not to relying on codified narrative theories or formulas - like three-act structures, etc. - but rather assume "what makes a good story" cannot be systematized and instead must be arrived at organically via extensive user testing.

name: Arduventure
description: Arduventure is a classic top-down 8-Bit RPG with original monochrome graphics and musical score. Collect items, weapons, armor, amulets and magic to fight enemies in turn-based battle system. Explore a massive world map larger than the one in Zelda: Links Awakening!

name: The Throne
description:
The Throne is a Metroidvania-style game, individual and offline that tells the story of a confrontation between the human race and the terrible orcs. Humans lived quietly within the limits of the wall of the Castle of Tauros, considered the most protected of all kingdoms on earth. One day, the king of Tauros was betrayed by his commander, Babon, who provided information on the great wall to the orc warriors in exchange for power and wealth. Many managed to escape, but several soldiers ended up trapped in the kingdom. Our protagonist, Eder, was appointed by the former king of Tauros to win back the castle and rescue the surviving soldiers. 
Welcome to The Throne world.

name: NieR: Automata - Day One Edition
description:
The Day One Edition of NieR:Automata includes:
‚Ä¢ Reversible Cover
‚Ä¢ Machine Mask Accessory
‚Ä¢ Grimoire Weiss Pod
‚Ä¢ Play System Pod Skin
‚Ä¢ Retro Grey Pod Skin
‚Ä¢ Retro Red Skin
‚Ä¢ Cardboard Pod Skin

name: NieR: Automata - Black Box Edition
description:
Black Box Edition
For gamers in search of exclusive items to complement the fast-paced action, we‚Äôre proud to present the Nier: Automata ‚ÄúBlack Box Edition,‚Äù exclusive to PS4.

Back at E3 2016 we showed off a prototype of the 2B statue during our Square Enix Presents livestream. Seeing the fully developed statue here and how awesome 2B looks, it brings an android tear to my eye.

A sleek black Collector‚Äôs Edition box housing the below exclusive content.
- The Nier: Automata game.
- Exquisitely crafted YoRHa ‚Äú2B‚Äù Figurine.
- Hardback 64-page artbook detailing the stunning artwork and illustrations from the game.
- Exclusive steelbook case featuring artwork from renowned Akihiko Yoshida (Final Fantasy XIV / Bravely Default).
- Hauntingly beautiful soundtrack containing 13 live recorded songs from Nier and Nier: Automata, composed by veteran Keiichi Okabe from Monaca, Inc. (Tekken / Drakengard / Nier).

- All Day One Edition digital content, including:
‚Ä¢ Machine Mask Accessory
‚Ä¢ Grimoire Weiss Pod
‚Ä¢ Play System Pod Skin
‚Ä¢ Retro Grey Pod Skin
‚Ä¢ Retro Red Pod Skin
‚Ä¢ Cardboard Pod Skin.

Copies will be limited, so be sure not to miss out as the ‚ÄúBlack Box Edition‚Äù will be available exclusively at the Square Enix Online Store.

name: Barbie Storymaker
description: Barbie Storymaker is a 1997 movie-making kit video game by Mattel Media, within the Barbie franchise. Choose the setting, the props, the characters. Direct each character‚Äôs movements and dialogue, plus add music, sounds and special effects. Create thousands of original Barbie stories!

name: FortressOne
description: FortressOne is a free, open source fork of the original 1996 QuakeWorld mod Team Fortress. It is a fast-paced, class based, arena first person shooter remastered with refined graphics, new mechanics and evolved gameplay.

name: Age of Empires II Mobile
description:
In 2005 a mobile version of Age of Empires II was released for Java mobile devices (J2ME), called Age of Empires II Mobile and developed by In-Fusio. It featured much simplified gameplay and graphics, designed for the mobile devices of the time.

The mobile game features similar gameplay to the PC version, albeit on a smaller scale. Three modes are available: a tutorial, a campaign split into three campaigns of seven scenarios each, and random map. Villagers gather food, wood, gold, and stone as resources, and military units can be trained. The player must progress through four different Ages: Dark Age, Feudal Age, Castle Age, and Imperial Age.

Age of Empires II Mobile Deluxe Edition was released in 2006. It adds two new civilizations: Persians and Japanese.

name: Age of Empires III Mobile
description: Age of Empires III is a real-time strategy video game developed by Microsoft Corporation's Ensemble Studios and published by Microsoft Game Studios. An N-Gage version of the game developed by Glu Mobile was released on April 28, 2009.

name: RTL Alarm f√ºr Cobra 11: Teil II
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Crashland
description:
CRASHLAND is a VR action horror game set on a hostile alien planet. You play as an intergalactic gladiator who is crashlanding and trying to survive until rescue. Combat in CRASHLAND is fast, vicious, and brutal. You will fight giant hellworms in the desert, terror birds in the forest, scorpions in the mist and spiders in the dark. There is nowhere to hide.

You will need to master your pistol, boomstick, scanner and teleporter to survive. New firing modes and powerups will drop during missions. By gaining XP you can level up, unlock perks, and radically alter how the game plays.

Features:
- Fast visceral combat against over 50 vicious and deadly creatures.
- 24 unique missions across desert, forest, and mountain biomes.
- Advanced procedural animation technology that helps bring the virtual creatures to life.
- Weather effects like howling winds, rain, thunder and snow.
- 30 perks to unlock including teleport punch, slow time, and turrets.
- Local, friend and galactic leaderboards.

name: Hex & Agon
description:
"Two perfect strangers on their journey through the unknown..."
Hex & Agon is a minimalist 2D platformer and roguelite hybrid.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Trunks: The Warrior Of Hope
description: This additional content will portray the story of an alternative world where Goku has succumbed to his heart disease and where most of the earth defenders have fallen to the cyborgs. In this world plunged into a state of constant fear and chaos, Trunks may be the very last hope!

name: Aquascapes
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Vaccine Hunter
description: Vaccine hunter will allow the player to experience the hardships of a special agent's life on their own skin. Bioterrorists have launched a dangerous virus and the president asks you to collect the necessary vials with a vaccine that will help scientists to stop the epidemic. You are a professional, so you will have to deal with hordes of criminals alone and by the classic method - with the help of well-aimed shots. Collect all the ampoules and stop the coming apocalypse!

name: Barrage Fantasia
description: An adorable retro SHMUP.

name: Martha
description: In pursuit of your missing colleague your car breaks down. You enter the only house for miles to use the phone. What follows next can only be described as an intense, action-driven fight for survival. What horrors lay within the house? Only one thing is certain: you need to get out.

name: Bloody Bunny: The Game
description: Bloody Bunny: The Game is a fast-paced hack-and-slash action title where you play as Bloody Bunny, a vengeful knife-wielding girl who is trapped in the body of a bunny doll.

developers.name: Digital Innovative Design and Technology Center

name: NullStar
description: Can you complete this finite runner? Test your arcade skills with NullStar. Death resets your progress, but unlocked power-ups are retained. The more you play and the farther you get, the better chance you have of getting to the end!

name: Food Gang
description: Food Gang is a free to play online game. Choose from 14 unique and crazy characters with more than 50 skills, fight against random opponents in 3 unique arenas and climb the trophy road!

name: Veinless Property
description:
Veinless Property is a cell shaded horror game based on a home invasion in the style of Junji Ito. 
 
This Game is one of 3 Games made in a 3 week long GameJam by Triality Games.

name: Microsoft: My Personal Tutor Preschool & Kindergarden
description:
Get a head start with all the essential skills for Preschool and Kindergarten with My Personal Tutor! There's fun and learning from start to finish with My Personal Tutor, the only comprehensive, grade-based solution with TutorAssist learning technology (Professor Presto!). Just like a tutor, this groundbreaking technology identifies your child's specific learning needs and offers instruction where and when it's needed most. 
 
This originally came in four disks for Preschool-First Grade (ages 3-7): Preschool Workshop, Alphabet Playhouse, Reader Railway, and Mathopolis.

name: L.O.C.K.
description: A small exploration of the universe, as previously imagined: based on cosmologies which place the Earth, and thus humans, at the center of the universe, Loci Omnes Caelesistis Kyries shifts between a simple diagram and a fascinating machine.

name: Microsoft: My Personal Tutor 1st & 2nd Grade
description: Come along with Professor Presto on a fun-filled learning journey--from outer space to beneath the sea, to a museum brimming with adventure. Microsoft My Personal Tutor: 1st & 2nd Grade contains hundreds of activities, games, songs, storybooks, and characters to entertain your child for hours. With three full-featured CD-ROMs, it's a great value. This software offers the TutorAssist technology to provide your child with personalized instruction that uses engaging multimedia tutorials.

name: Neighbor
description: A point-and-click story that sees a friendship unfold over several days in a desert where objects are dug up, traded, and offered to monoliths.

name: A Glass Room
description: A Glass Room explores the process of navigating memory, simultaneously remembering and recreating past moments in an attempt to grasp on fugitive emotions, wandering a dreamlike labyrinth of flickering images.

name: Otaku's Rage: Waifu Strikes Back
description:
This is a visual story with match3 combat system. You will be able to upgrade your character and gain new abilities in battle.) this line is fine 
 
You will have to fight each girl so that she will teach you her tricks that she knows, because in the finale you will have to defeat the main villain of the World of Waifu.

name: CastleBoy
description: A small fan-made Castlevania demake for the Arduboy.

name: Dark & Under
description: A turn-based RPG dungeon crawler released in 2017 for the Arduboy.

name: The Climb 2
description: The thrill of climbing comes alive with The Climb 2 - explore a new city setting and exhilarating new maps with breathtaking views. Ascend grand peaks, navigate vast caves, climb skyscrapers, and discover hidden shortcuts as you find your path to the top. Compete with friends and conquer leaderboards in asynchronous multiplayer modes. From exploring mountain environments to scaling urban settings, feel the rush of climbing without ropes, and experience breathtaking vistas as you scale new heights.

name: Evade 2
description: A first-person 3D space combat game for the Arduboy, and a sequel to the side-scrolling shooter Evade.

name: Hopper
description: A 3D vertical platformer for the Arduboy in which players must ascend to the highest trampoline they can.

name: MicroCity
description: A small city-building and management game for the Arduboy.

name: Mini Rogue
description: An Arduboy adaptation of the Mini Rogue tabletop game designed by Paolo Di Stefano and Gabriel Gendron.

name: Mia's Math Adventure: Just in Time!
description: Mia's Math Adventure: Just in Time! is the third title of the Mia's Big Adventure Collection software series created by Kutoka Interactive. Released in 2001 in Canada and the United States, the game teaches mathematics to children between 6 and 10 years old.

name: Intravenous
description: Teeth-clenching stealth, followed by hardcore gunplay for those not looking for a quiet way in. Intravenous will keep you at the edge of your seat regardless of how you play!

name: Aeterna Noctis
description: Aeterna Noctis is a challenging 2D hand-drawn action platformer, a Metroidvania with thrilling combat that will keep you on the edge of your seat and heart-stopping platform sections that will put your skills to the test. Become the King of Darkness in an epic journey through 16 connected areas.

name: Sengoku Koihime: Otome Kenran Sengoku Emaki
description:
Kensuke trained hard every day under the tutelage of his uncle Kazuto. One day, when he held a sword he found in the storehouse, he lost consciousness. When he came to, he found himself in a place he did not recognize. He met a girl who introduced herself as Oda Saburou Kuon Nobunaga. She held out her hand to a stunned Kensuke and asked him to become her husband and accompany her on the road to national supremacy.

They traveled across the country, racking up victories in this period of social upheaval. However, there was one enemy they could not defeat: the oni. These man-eating, blood-drinking beasts soon took over all of Japan, plunging the country into hell. However, Kuon and Kensuke vowed to continue fighting, issuing a written appeal to all the influential lords: ‚ÄúSamurai who are not afraid of even the oni, gather under me and let us save Japan together!‚Äù

name: Hello Charlotte: Heaven's Gate
description:
You're hidden behind the lines.
I reach out, deafened by silence.
As we mourn the Grasshopper's passing,
Heaven's gate opens.

name: Partition Sector
description: Blow up your friends - and snakes - in 6 game modes including Battle Royale, Capture the Flag, King of the Hill and Snake Hunter! Up to 20 players in local multiplayer, with online play via Steam Remote Play Together - only one player needs to own the game!

name: The Fancy Pants Adventures: World 1 Remaster
description:
How fancy are your pants?
Relive the nostalgia of The Fancy Pants Adventures: World 1 as you speed over spidery slopes and parkour your way to victory!

name: Autobahn Raser: Das Spiel zum Film
description: Autobahn Raser: Das Spiel zum Film is the game based on the movie Autobahn Raser which is based on the Autobahn Raser game series. Like usual the player races through courses based on real German cities, this time Munich, Berlin, Hamburg and Cologne. There are four playing modes: racing against opponents, racing against the clock, police chases and a campaign which has nothing to do with the movie. The difference to the regular races is that the player sometimes has to ram stolen car dealers off the road.The connection to the movie are film sequences, biographies of the actors, the original soundtrack and similar cars.

name: Holiday Racer
description:
Holiday Racer is another entry in the Davilex Racer series where the player takes part in a TV show. The price is a free trailer pitch in Monaco. But of course the player has to work for it - in this case the task is to win six illegal street races in Aachen, Paris, Lyon, Marseilles, Monaco and Nice. There are five humorous exaggerated persons to choose, e.g. a hippie or a stressed family father.

The races are heavily action oriented and include power-ups which either increase the top speed, freeze other cars or repair the own vehicle. Between the races the player can invest earned points in better tires, engines or gearboxes; he also can gamble for other equipment. The available vehicles are no regular cars but jet ski trailers or jeeps. When beating the game with all vehicle types the player unlocks a special car.

name: Speedboat Racing
description:
Speedboat Racing is a racing game where players can race with speedboats through the canals of Venice and Amsterdam. For every race, players can choose a certain boat with a captain that all have their own strengths and weaknesses.

The game contains three different game modes: Championship, Quickrace and Sightseeing.* Championship is a career mode where players have to complete and win several pre-determined races to become the ultimate champion. This mode has to be played in order to unlock more boats.

Quickrace is a mode where the player can choose the location and boat and complete the race. No statistics are being collected from this mode.

In Sightseeing, the player can freely roam the different maps and sail through the canals, discovering the regions and buildings around. There is no race to complete in this mode and this mode only ends when the player quits to the main menu.

Players can not only race the computer opponents, but also hinder them by using torpedo's or guided missiles, temporarily disorienting them or blowing them into an other direction. Coiled springs can be collected to jump out of the water and over something. The player can also collect turbo's to temporarily boost the speed of the boat.

name: Okuplok Slaughter Map
description: Okuplok Slaughter Map (aka untitled 2) is a single-level PWAD for Doom II using a Boom-compatible source port. It was designed by Okuplok in 2012 and uses a MIDI rendition of "Central Park" from Last Ninja 2, composed by Matt Gray and sequenced by Chris Holm. It is regarded as one of the largest and hardest slaughter maps ever released.

name: The Punisher WarZone: CaseBox 01
description: The Punisher-WarZone: CaseBox 01 Total Conversion is a mix of ideas from The Punisher: War Zone movie, THQ Punisher video game, comic-books by Garth Ennis and new ideas from the creator.

Made for Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend 1

description: An open-source rhythm dancing game which is a fork of StepMania 3.95 with the goal of adding arcade-like ITG-style behavior and serving as a drop-in replacement for the ITG binary on arcade cabinets.

name: Legacy of Suffering
description: Legacy of Suffering (a.k.a LOS), is a Doom 3 themed mod for GZDoom and Skulltag created by Logan MTM, released on 28 November 2009, and was updated on December 1 the same year. It received one of the 2009 Cacowards. The mod also contains artworks by Licinio Ribeiro de Souza and was playtested by Nigel "Enjay" Rowand.

name: Intervilles, le jeu officiel
description: Intervilles, le jeu officiel provides the atmosphere of Intervilles in your living room. But beware, Rosa the cow is not far and her favorite pastime is to drop the candidates! Live the show as if you were there! In competition with a friend, take on the 25 challenges of your favorite show with public acclaim. Action, falls and laughs in perspective!

name: Introvert: A Teenager Simulator
description:
Warning: This game contains heavy material that might make players/audience uncomfortable.

This game talks about serious issues such as bullying and suicidal thoughts in a new and different way that will hopefully be interpreted better by the new generation. In this game. This project is also personal to me. It is a small universe I created to make my zone-out thoughts and stories a reality. I made this game cause I was sad so it took a while to be finished, cause you know‚Ä¶ It‚Äôs hard to work on something when you‚Äôre sad.

name: Demonfear
description:
Demonfear is a 32-map megawad for Doom II created by Adam Windsor. Though it is listed as one of Doomworld's Top 100 WADs of All Time in the year 1999, its release on the idgames archive dates it at 17 March of 2000. It is known primarily for being composed of short, fairly straightforward levels, a possible progenitor of Erik Alm's Scythe.

Demonfear is a compilation of small episodes released by Windsor between 1995 and 1999, known otherwise as Demonfear 1-6. An early, alternate version of Demonfear 6 was partially complete in 1997, but Windsor donated the maps to Requiem when the project had stagnated due to a handful of authors failing to provide maps for slots they had claimed. The compiler dropped Windsor's levels into the previously vacant slots so that his old Demonfear 6 MAP26, 27, and 28 appear as Requiem's MAP20, 26, and 25, respectively. Windsor would go on to create a new Demonfear 6 and then compile his own megawad.

Demonfear comes with a text file that describes in detail the story of the megawad on a level-by-level basis. The plot involves another surprise demon invasion of Earth; mirroring the action of Doom II, the protagonist travels through various military complexes and into a city, eventually entering Hell itself in what is apparently a twisted facsimile of the normal world.

In 2019, Doomworld user P41R47 made a MIDI pack for Demonfear, which also includes miscellaneous enhancements for the intermission, text screens, and ending.

name: Twilight Warrior
description: Twilight Warrior is a tactical military Doom II total conversion created by Black Shadow Software that requires source port Doom Legacy. The initial November 15, 1998 release hosted on Doomworld was followed by a v1.01 upgrade on December 20, 1998.

name: 1812: Heart of Winter
description: 1812 The Heart of Winter is an unusual Polish production, realized in the form of an audiobook with minimal graphic design.

name: Inner-Tube Climber
description:
Inner-Tube Climber is a mobile game with polished platforming controls and a unique wall-bouncing mechanic. This endless-climber game is available on Android and iOS. 
 
"Oh no! The player is stuck inside their inner-tube from a tragic accident, which also left them trapped in the bottom of an endless crevasse!"

name: Open Country
description: Ok Scout, it's time to show us what you‚Äôre made of-break free from your city life and live like a real outdoorsman. The wilderness isn‚Äôt for the faint of heart, but if you work hard, learn how to use the environment and be one with nature, you too can become a Master Outdoorsman.

name: Sonic Blast Man
description: Sonic Blast Man is a beat'em up based on the arcade classic. In this version Sonic Blast Man must save the Earth from diverse kinds of evil forces, from street gangs and terrorists, to aliens and robots and finally, an evil clone of himself under the name of "Heavy Blast Man". The fight starts on a construction site in Earth and ends up in outer space.

name: Forza Horizon 4: Hot Wheels Legends Car Pack
description:
The Hot Wheels Legends Car Pack is a downloadable car pack for Forza Horizon 4 released on February 22, 2021 after Update 32. 
The pack includes six vehicles from participants of the 2018 and 2019 Hot Wheels Legends Tours, featuring the winners as well as four finalists from both years of the competition. 
 
It is not included in any bundles or special edition releases, and must be purchased separately.

name: Forza Horizon 4: Barrett-Jackson Car Pack
description: The Barrett-Jackson Car Pack is a downloadable car pack for Forza Horizon 4 released with Update 8. The pack is included with the Car Pass but can also be bought separately.

name: In Rays of the Light
description:
There is only you, the abandoned remains of a former life and the flourishing nature that feels great in the absence of man. This world is both gloomy and empty, but so incredibly beautiful.

‚ÄúIn rays of the Light‚Äù is an atmospheric author‚Äôs parable about our place in this world, life and death. Explore a mysterious territory filled with a variety of details that reveal the story. Solve logic puzzles and study text messages along the way.

name: Life of Fly
description:
Life of Fly features 12 short stories each revolving around the life and thoughts of another fly. 
It is an interesting yet relaxing narrative flight game like no other. 
 
You jump into the role of a little fly which is collecting it thought while exploring its own living environment. 
The most interesting content of the game is on a meta-level where each fly talks about its life, about some things that happened to them, and about some almost philosophical thoughts they had. 
 
Be prepared to experience some very unusual content, some interesting thoughts that go way beyond the normal life of a fly, and some entertaining short stories with a twist.

name: Kandidatos Kart
description: Kandidatos Kart is a single-player racing game featuring characters based on Brazilian political figures.

name: Evil Inside
description: Evil Inside is a first-person psychological horror game. After the death of his mother and the arrest of his father for it, Mark decides to contact her using the Spiritual board. But it fades away, and here is when all begins... Mark will face his greatest fears to discover the truth.

name: Forza Horizon 2: Porsche Expansion
description:
The Porsche Expansion is a downloadable content pack released on June 6, 2015 for the Xbox One release of Forza Horizon 2 .
The expansion adds ten Porsche cars to the game along with various Porsche themed events and achievements. On July 16, 2015, the free Porsche Bonus Car Pack was released that added two additional Porsche cars, but was removed from the Xbox Games Store on July 24, 2015.

Since October 1, 2018, following the title's end-of-life-status, it can be no longer purchased from the Microsoft Store.

description: The GBA port is identical to the SNES version, but the password feature has been removed and replaced with three save slots, no longer allowing the player to replay any level at any time.

name: The Lost Vikings

Project OutFox is a multi-moded rhythm game based on the StepMania engine that includes different game styles and effects to add new features to charts, themes and noteskins. It provides compatibility with previous StepMania 5.1/5.0 content, including charts from StepMania 3.9, and older Dance With Intensity Content, BMS/PMS, piu, para etc charts

It features new simulation modes and options not previously available in older StepMania versions released to date, focusing on modernizing the engine to improve performance, graphical fidelity, and to refurbish parts of the game that have been neglected since 2007.

description: Chibi Rebellion is a SD (Super Deformed) take on the Star Wars universe. Players will go through a hub of randomly selected maps, blasting enemies, solving simple puzzles, and otherwise having fun. Chibi Rebellion falls somewhere between Lego Star Wars and Yoda Stories, so if you didn't like either one of those, you probably won't enjoy this. There is no gore in Chibi Rebellion, enemies typically leave behind a bouncing helmet to signify their passing.

name: That Feeling Blue

name: Pixelot
description: Pixelot is a classic RPG that combines the best parts of old school role-playing games. In Pixelot you create a custom hero and gather allies to defend against the darkness that has swept over the land of Pixelot. The game features numerous recruitable characters, playable classes, items, monsters, and dungeons alike. Promising an engaging story line, humorous dialogue, and a classic yet simple design, Pixelot is a game that is easy to pick up and hard to put down.

name: Pick-up League Hockey
description: Pick-up League Hockey is a 3 vs 3 player multiplayer hockey simulator with realistic skating physics and a full size rink. Experience hockey in VR like you've never seen it before!

name: Goose Goose Duck
description: Goose, goose, Duck? A game of social deduction where you and your fellow geese must work together to complete your mission. Keep an eye out for those malicious Mallards and other birds, who have infiltrated your team and will do anything to stop you.

name: Caesars Palace
description: CAESARS PALACE brings casino gambling at its finest to the PlayStation. Start out with $1,000 and try to turn it into a million playing Baccarat, Roulette, Craps, Blackjack, and slot machines. Just in case you don't know how to play a game, watch the official Caesars Palace Casino Tutorial. After watching the video, you'll want to hit the tables with lower bet limits; as your winnings increase, new tables with higher limits and minimums open up. Statistician and gambling guru, Dr. William Bertram, has verified the payoffs and odds, so the chances of winning big are the same as in the real world. CAESARS PALACE has all of the excitement of real world gambling without all of the losses.

name: No Way Out: A Dead Realm Tale
description:
100 years after the massacre at Huxley‚Äôs Mansion rumors swirl of an unclaimed treasures waiting to be collected. But there are things the rumors don‚Äôt mention. The murderous ghosts who prowl the hallways waiting for your torch to dim‚Ä¶ The wails of a grieving mother who begs you to help her son. And the madman at the center of it all, William Huxley, whose inventions have left the mansion suspended somewhere between Earth and hell.

No Way Out: A Dead Realm Tale challenges you to solve puzzles, overcome ghosts and free yourself from Huxley‚Äôs grasp before it‚Äôs too late. This immersive VR experience provides a spine-tingling twist on the haunted house genre. Will you escape? Or will you become just another lost soul trapped forever in Huxley‚Äôs Mansion?

name: Pombero: The Lord of the Night
description: Overcome fear, solve the mystery behind the story, in this psychological horror game.

One Night in the Woods is a prequel to the story known from Apocalipsis: Harry at the End of the World. During his adventures Harry is being hunted by unsettling dreams about his beloved Zula dancing around the fire in the woods.

In the DLC player takes her role to discover secrets of the woods and reveal the real story behind her mysterious disappearances. With demons lurking in the dark of the forest, it will be a night to remember...

description: Rally your party. Build your deck and boost its power and potential. Slay your enemies and protect your allies. Play your cards right and you might just survive the perilous descent into the depths of Deepest Chamber: Resurrection.

name: Neoverse Trinity Edition
description: NEOVERSE is a time-warping multiverse game consisting of thrilling adventures that are packed with great and exciting challenges; combining rogue-lite, deck building, strategy gameplay all in one. It puts your skills to the test. Set off on an adventure with unique heroes to save the living realms regardless of time and space.

name: Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children - White Lion and Black Witch
description: First extra scenario for Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children, a turn-based strategy SRPG, which adds two new characters with their story and new missions.

name: Battle Chess Enhanced

name: Stop the Bus
description: A card game developed by Crystal Squid.

name: We Were Here Forever
description: You and your fellow prisoner are trapped in the realm of Castle Rock - were you betrayed, or simply not that clever? To escape, you must explore the sinister castle for puzzles and plot your escape together. Secrets and riddles are hidden in the shadows. Just be aware that nothing is what it seems in this mysterious Antarctic adventure. Can you two escape together, or will you be trapped‚Ä¶ forever?

name: I Love You!
description:
Follow the antics of a strong-headed female protagonist through her school days in I Love You!, a visual novel otome game where you could meet and date some good boys depending on the choices you make!

Take the lead in the relationship and live an unforgettable school festival with your friends, or even your future boyfriend. What fun moments will ensue? Who will you choose in the end?

name: S√©culos
description: S√©culos is a short game, inspired by the quarantine period, where you have to find ways to pass your time by doing various activities around the house you're stuck in, while you wait for someone to come. The activities include light puzzles and minigames, which may lead to different endings.

name: Chicken Invaders Universe
description:
Chicken Invaders needs no introduction.

Well, fine, if you insist. Chicken Invaders is the most successful chicken game of this millennium (not to mention the previous one). The game puts you at the forefront of a battle against invading intergalactic chickens, bent on revenge against the human race for our oppression of Earth chickens.

In Chicken Invaders Universe, you assume the role of a new recruit in the United Hero Force (UHF), mankind's last hope against the fowl Henpire. You start your UHF career deployed in some backwater galactic star system, and it's up to you to advance through UHF ranks and earn your place in the honorary annals of Heroes Academy. Travel across the galaxy, explore strange new worlds, seek out new life and new civilizations, and exterminate any Henpire forces that cross your path. And do so in style.

name: Rivals Squad
description: Rivals Squad is a Multi Game! You can play as many Game Modes as you like among friends or other players. Discover our Battle Royale, Deathmatch and also our INFERNAL Mode !!! With fun and varied gameplay and extraordinary powers and abilities.

name: Inspecteur Banaan en de ontvoering van Mabella
description: A Dutch Point 'n click adventure created by Torpedo Software for Davilex. You play a cop named Govert Banaan and you have to investigate a kidnapping case of the fictional pop star MaBella. In the game you have will explore Amsterdam. The graphics style is a mix of real-life photographs and cartoon characters.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge
description: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge is a side-scrolling beat 'em up developed by Tribute Games and published by DotEmu. Inspired by the 1987 Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles animated series, the game pays homage to classic TMNT titles like Turtles in Time, featuring retro-inspired pixel art and dynamic combat. Players control Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello, Raphael, or other allies, each with unique abilities, as they battle through various levels to thwart Shredder and Krang's plans to conquer New York City. The game supports solo play or co-op for up to six players, blending nostalgic design with modern gameplay mechanics.

name: Invisible Wings: Chapter One
description:
Invisible Wings is a narrative adventure game that takes the player on a journey in a dystopian fantasy setting. Follow Dawn, a young woman of faerie descent, as she tries to find answers to her own identity in a modern world, where faeries and humans were supposed to live in harmony. Being bullied and harassed most of her life because of her appearance, she wants nothing more than just being an ordinary human. Although she blames her magical ancestors for all her problems, she meets a faerie herself, who grows more than a friend to her and complicates her quest even further.

Explore the vibrant and diverse city of Ceylynn in an interactive visual novel, characterized by recognizable characters, a rich world full of lore and a memorable soundtrack.

Content warning: Invisible Wings contains implicit references to murder and self-harm, which may be content not suited for everyone. Player discretion is advised.

A VR Esport unlike any other. Fly through the arenas equipped with your Zenith Suit, an advanced movement system. Your Zenith Suit is equipped with Grapple Hooks, Jet Packs, and Gliders, giving you ultimate control over your flight.

Vertical Shift also features a single-player campaign! Explore the City of Orion, a futuristic metropolis on the brink of collapse. Join the resistance and help take down the evil government through a variety of missions and activities. Or just swing around and take in the sights!

name: GoldenEye 007
description:
The GoldenEye story comes to life once again with an updated single player storyline featuring Daniel Craig as Bond and written by Bruce Feirstein, the screenwriter for the original movie.

Surprise enemies covertly or engage in a full on firefight and use Bond's latest gadget to uncover intel in augmented reality as you relive all the classic GoldenEye movie moments. Infiltrate the dam and destroy the facility; chase Ourumov in the tank through the streets of St. Petersburgh; and investigate the secret jungle base.

name: KingMania
description:
Kingmania is a quick action strategy game that will test players ability to make quick tactical decisions. 
 
Players can control different buildings, using their power and the power of troops the buildings produce to defeat their opponents. 
 
Each of the buildings in the game has another purpose and can be improved upon - castles produce strong knights and allow players to cast magical spells at enemy buildings or to summon dragons. Villages provide food as well as villagers, who are weak warriors, but attack in hordes and when they turn to berserkers, they can gain a destructible force. Gold can be gathered at mines, mage towers can shoot fireballs and destroy garrisons in enemy houses, etc.

name: Cow Clicker
description: A self-described "Facebook game about Facebook games", Cow Clicker was a game in which players earned points by clicking on a cow every six hours, with microtransactions for timer overrides and premium cow designs. Though intended as a satire of of game design trends, the game was unexpectedly popular and it is now recognized as an early example of the clicker or idle game genre.

name: A Musical Story
description:
‚ÄòA Musical Story‚Äô is a rhythm game set against a 70s backdrop.
A Musical Story is the debut game from independent French developer, Glee-Cheese Studio.

name: Immortal Saga

name: Beach Buggy Racing 2: Island Adventure
description: Beach Buggy Racing 2: Island Adventure is an action-packed, mayhem-filled kart racer with split-screen competition and game rule customization. Play any part of the game solo or with friends in split-screen‚Äîfrom the story-driven Adventure mode to multi-event Championships, adrenaline-pumping Races, skill-mastering Drift Attacks and more.

name: Survival Quiz City
description:
Survival Quiz City is a multiplayer Survival Quiz Action game where only your smarts and skills will help you survive! Players answer questions and divide into two groups: the winners (correct answers) and the losers (incorrect answers). Fight as a team to win each round and survive to become the winner!

The game is set to shutdown on October 31st with the option to transfer data to the new Japanese only free-to-play version of the game launching on October 12th.

name: Unciv
description: An open-source re-implementation of the most famous civilization-building game ever - Civ V! Build your civilization, research technologies, expand your cities and defeat your foes!

name: Troll Face Horror Quest 2: Halloween Special
description:
Scary, funny, and bizarre adventures are what Troll Face Quest: Horror 2 has in store for you in this second installment of the mind-blowing TFQ horror series!
These terrifying but hilarious puzzles are filled with scary references to many of your favorite horror movies and TV shows. Point and click your way through the game to find out! Will you make it all the way to the final level and escape with your sanity?

name: Apollo 3000: Wild Space
description:
Apollo 3000 is an upcoming First Person Shooter game that with the possibilities of Virtual Reality technology will allow players to explore different parts of the galaxy and interact with its inhabitants. Work as a galactic mercenary, let your ship become your second home and climb the ladder of a reputation as a soldier of fortune.
Your PC and VR goggles are enough to board the best starships in the known universe or to put on a Power Armour and fight the most dangerous alien races on foot.
